item.text: (nga) @#/ ! /'dul ba lung bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 律師戒行經第四部
'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad bcu gsum pa/ gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la
gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang
po'i mig gis kyang lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/ lha 'di ni bro 'tshal ba zhes bgyi'o/ kha lo sgyur ba
nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha mi 'di gang 'dis 'gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de
mchis te/ lha 'di ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ kha lo sgyur ba nga yang nad kyi chos dang nad kyi chos
nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha yang snyun gyi chos dang snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/ kha lo sgyur
ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas nga nad las
ma 'das shes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang
nyid du chas te/ der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces de nas mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ mi ni
lus rid skya bo rbab rbab po/ /rang dbang med pa'i nad thebs 'dir gzigs nas/ /nad las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis

kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/ bskyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/ lha ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/

lha gzhon nu bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la bka' stsal

pa/ kha lo sgyur ba mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha 'di ni bros thebs pa
zhes bgyi'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mi 'di gang gnod pa 'dis 'gum par 'gyur pa'i gnas de mchis te/

lha de ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba nga yang nad kyi chos dang nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha yang snyun gyi chos dang

snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir bsgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas nga nad las ma 'das shes grags pa'i don de nyid

bsam par bya'o/ /lha gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas nga yang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan

dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang / gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar

'gyur du 'ong gis/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis

byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin te ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/ /'dir smras pa/ de tshe dga' nas bdag 'dor mi

gzhug phyir/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang / /reg bya yid du 'ong ba gtso rnams kyi/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yang byin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par

bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/ kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / der nga zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro 'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas de nas byang chub sems

dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig /der nga zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub

sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams te byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs te bskyed mos tshal

gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang / khyogs khyer ba dang / mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas

'gro ba dang / bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin 'brang ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang /

khyogs khyer ba dang / mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang / bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin du 'brang ba 'di ci yin/ lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/ kha lo sgyur

ba shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha mi 'dis slan chad sdug pa'i pha ma mi mthong zhing bu pho dang / bu mo dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang ma lags la/

de dag gis kyang slan chad 'di mi mthong bas lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi 'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba nga yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma

'das so/ /kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir bsgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas nga 'chi ba las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya 'o/ kha lo sgyur bas shing

rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/

tshe zad pa yis 'du shes bral gyur cing / /sems med mi yi ro zhig gzigs nas ni/ /'chi las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo

sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/ bskyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/ lha ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha gzhon nu bskyed

mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na ras kha dog sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i bla re bres pa dang / khyogs khyer ba dang / mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas mchi ba dang / bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing

rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang / khyogs khyer ba dang / mdun na me sgron thogs pa

dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang / bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba 'di ci yin de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi 'o/ /des 'di skad ces

gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha mi 'dis slan chad sdug pa'i pha ma mi mthong zhing / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang /

zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyang ma lags la/ de rnams kyis kyang slan chad 'di mi mthong bas lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi 'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba nga yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid

las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir bsgyur cig pho

brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas 'chi ba las ma 'das shes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya 'o/ /lha gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig

ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang / gzhon nu skra dang

kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la ci

nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya 'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin nas ci nas kyang 'di la

dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/ /'dir smras pa/ grong khyer dam pa dpal ldan yid 'ong der/ /lha yi lhar gyur sgron ma dang mtshungs pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga pos kun dgyes pa/ /mig stong
dga' ba'i tshal na gnas pa bzhin/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya dgos te/

'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas de rnams kyis mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyim dang khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba

zhig sprul to/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang der nga zhugs nas

bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig /der nga zhugs nas
bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/ /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas

byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa lag pa na lhung bzed

thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba mi skra bregs shing lag na lhung bzed thogs nas

khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la 'di'i gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ lha de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi 'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba rab tu byung

ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha rab tu byung ba de ni dul ba legs pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs

spyod pa legs par rigs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ste/ lha 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi 'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba de'i

phyir shing rta 'di rab tu byung ba gang na ba de logs su bsgyur cig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas shing rta de rab tu byung ba gang na ba der bsgyur to/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye mi khyod ci'i phyir skra bregs shing lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing

'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ci ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba yin/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu bdag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi 'o/ /kye mi khyod ji ltar na rab tu byung ba zhes
bya/ gzhon nu bdag gis dul ba legs pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs

par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya 'o/ /kye mi khyod kyis dul ba legs pa dang /

yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/

dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba legs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir bsgyur cig pho brang nyid

du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas don 'di kho na bsam par bya'o/ kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der pho brang du gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa kye ma 'o

bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya 'o snyam pa'i don de nyid dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/

kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/ bskyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/ lha ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha gzhon nu bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir

byung ba na mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig 'tshal ba sug pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing mchi ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo

sgyur ba mi skra bregs pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la 'di'i gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis

'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi 'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha rab tu byung ba de ni dul ba legs

pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos

nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ste/ lha 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi 'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta 'di rab tu byung ba gang na ba de logs su bsgyur

cig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas shing rta de rab tu byung ba gang na ba de logs su bsgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces

gsungs te/ kye mi khyod ci'i phyir skra bregs la lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang

mi 'dra ba yin/ des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gzhon nu bdag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya 'o/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ kye mi khyod ji ltar rab tu byung ba zhes bya/ des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gzhon nu bdag
gis dul ba legs pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par rig

nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya 'o/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa kye mi khyod kyis
dul ba legs pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu

bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba legs so/ /lha de nas gzhon nus gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir bsgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo //

'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas don 'di bsam par bya 'o/ /bdag gis de nas shing rta bsgyur nas gzhon nu pho brang du zhugs so/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang

dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang / gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu zhing pa'i

grong du btang la ci nas kyang de la sems g.yengs par 'gyur bar bya 'o snyam nas/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu tshur shog /khyod zhing pa'i grong du song la las kyi mtha' la ltos shig /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgas pa dang / nad pa dang / shi ba mthong nas ni yid byung ngo / /rab tu byung ba la ni mngon par zhen pa'i blos yab shAkya zas gtsang gi tshig gsan nas shing rtar zhugs te zhing pa'i grong du skus

gshegs kyi thugs kyis ni ma yin no/ /de la lam kar gter lnga brgyas kha nye bar bstan te sgra phyung ba/ gzhon nu bdag cag ni khyod kyi nye du'i gter lags kyis bdag cag bzhes shig /byang chub sems dpas

gsungs pa/ re shig de rnams kyis blun po'i yongs su gzung ba byas nas ci zhig byas/ khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song shig /tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa/ gang gis nga la 'chi ba'i gtam smras pa/ /

de dag kyang shi gtam du gyur pa yin/ /bdag kyang shi nas ring po mi thogs par/ /gzhan dag gi yang gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong / /de rnams kyis yang sgra phyung ba/ /gzhon nus gal te mi bzhes na/ /bdag cag rgya mtsho

chen por 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpas ci bde bar zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang de rnams rgya mtsho chan po'i nang du zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na zhing pa skra gyen du 'greng

ba/ lag pa dang rkang pa ser ga byung ba/ lus rdul gyis yog pa dag cig dang / rmon pa lcag gzer bu rnon po can gyis lus dral bas rgyab dang mjug do'i phyogs khrag gis yog pa/ ltogs pa dang skom pas dbugs

brdzags shing snying ga'i phyogs nas dbugs brdzags pa ring du 'dren la gnya' shing gis mnan pa'i rma las rnag khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang 'bu'i tshogs za ba/ thong lcags kyis rkang pa rma byung zhing / kha dang sna nas kha chu sna chu
'dzag la sbal pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings kyis yog pa rnams gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod nams bskyed cing bsags pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i

thugs kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /shes ldan dag khyod su'i yin/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha'i lags so/ /des gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag ding phan chad bran du mi bya/ mngag gzhug par mi

bya/ rang dbang can gang dga' bar 'gro bar byas/ bde ba la reg par gnos shig /rmon pa rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa/ khyed cag kyang deng phyin chad rtswa mchog ma nyams pa la za zhing chu ma rdul ma brnyogs shing dang ba

dag la 'thungs shig /khyod la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid byung ba de nyid kyis yab shAkya zas gtsang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas shing 'dzam bu'i

grib ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/ 'dod pa las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i

dga' ba dang bde ba can zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' spangs te mi 'gro bar shing gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang

gis bsams pa byang chub sems dpa' ring zhig thogs te 'di ltar dro'i dus las yol gyis ltar 'gro'o zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing shing 'dzam bu'i drung du

phyin to/ /de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub
sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur na shing 'dzam bu'i

grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ 'di ltar da lta nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar

phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur na shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che 'o snyam mo/ /de nas dga' ba'i sti stang byas te byang chub sems
dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ji ltar bltams tshe sa ni g.yos pa ltar/ /'dzam bu'i grib mas khyod sku mi gtong ba/ /blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste/ /kun

gzigs khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo dkrung bcas pa las bslang nas shing rtar zhugs te/ dur khrod kyi nang nas ser skya'i gzhir gshegs pa na

byang chub sems dpas dur khrod kyi nang na mi ro rnam par sngos pa dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang / rnam par bam pa dag gzigs nas de shin du skyo ba skyes te/ shing rtar zhugs bzhin du skyil mo dkrung bcas nas

bzhugs so/ /de nas yang rgyal po zas gtsang gis skyil mo dkrung bcas pa las bslang nas/ ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ grong khyer gyi nang du 'jug pa na mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon nu zhag bdun

gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar lung bstan par rig nas de rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te de yi bzang po gzigs bzhed na/ /de'i slad dgung

bdun bar du srungs shig dang / /mi dbang gdugs ni bdal bar gyur pa na/ /rin chen sna bdun 'byung bar the tshom med/ /khyod sras rin chen bdun po yi/ /dbang phyug gi ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho la ni thug

pa'i sa/ /chad pa med pas skyong bar 'gyur/ /'on te sa ni spangs nas su/ /bsnyengs med nags su bzhud na ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas/ /'gro ba sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ /shAkya dus legs kyi bu mo

ri dgas skyes zhes bya ba de skar khung na 'dug pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kye ma 'di yi yum bde zhing / /yab de yang ni bde ba yin/ /kye ma gang gi khyim thab 'gyur/ /bud med de

yang mya ngan 'das/ /skyes mchog bsam gtan pa de yis/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra thos nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi nyid du/ /mkhyen nas de la thugs dgyes gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas legs par smras pa'i phyir

mu tig gi phreng ba 'phangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus skar khung nas song ste de'i mgul du 'khris par gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyis nang du song ba de mthong nas/ de rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyas

par smras nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ri dgas skyes 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dgas skyes la sogs pa'i 'khor bud
med drug khri yod do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gcung bre bo zas dang / zas dkar dang / tshad med zas gsum dang lhan cig gcig tu tshogs nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan dang

ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ de lta bas na bdag cag

gis byang chub sems dpa' zhag bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te bsrung bar bya zhing grong khyer yang legs par bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas de rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rim pa bdun dang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis

bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo 'phar lcags las byas shing / sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te sgo phye na de'i sgras dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu grag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems

dpa' ni khang bzangs kyi gzhi na bud med yid 'phrog pa gzugs bzang ba rnams dang / gar dang glu dang / rol mo rnams kyi spyod pas bsnyen bkur byed du bcug go/ /blon po rnams ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang

lhan cig ra ba'i phyi rol kho ra khor yug tu gcan pa byed du bcug go/ /skas spor rung ba mi lnga brgyas tshugs pa yang byas so/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgor yang sgo phye na de'i sgras rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang du grag cing

de thos nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mi dang / grong khyer gyi sgo srungs rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi grong khyer gyi phyi rol nas srung du bcug pa rnams bag dang chas te 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu btags so/ /byang chub

sems dpa' ni steng gi khang bzangs gi gzhi skyes pa med par zhugs nas pi bang dang / gling bu dang / 'khar rnga dang / sgra snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha spyad dag nye bar len cing 'byor pa chen pos bzhugs so/ /mtshan mo

ni rgyal po zas gtsang yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go/ /lho phyogs na ni bre bo zas so/ /nub phyogs na ni zas dkar ro/ /byang phyogs na ni tshad med zas so/ /grong khyer gyi dbus kyi

'gram po byed pa ni shAkya ming chen no/ /de shar sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe byed rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha mel tshe mdzod cig /
mel tshe mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras te/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/ /gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song / /'di na mi nyal rtag tu mkhas/ /

de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /lho sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ bre bo zas kyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha mel tshe mdzod cig /mel tshe mdzad dang khyod la

legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/ /gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song / /gnyid log 'chi bdag dbang du song / /de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /

nub sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ zas dkar gyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha mel tshe mdzod cig /mel tshe mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas

tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gnyid log pa ni rtag tu myos/ /myos 'gyur bre bos 'thungs pa nyal/ /dgon pa'i nags su nyal ba 'dra/ /de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /byang sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel

tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ tshad med zas kyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha mel tshe mdzod cig /mel tshe mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/

ri nyal ri sul nyal ba bzhin/ /rgya mtsho'i chur ni nyal ba dang / /ljon shing rtse la nyal ba bzhin/ /de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /dbus kyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/
su zhig mel tshe byed/ srungs ma rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag mel tshe bgyid do/ /mel tshe byos shig /mel tshe byos dang legs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/

chos spyod chos ma yin ma spyod/ /bden pa smros shig brdzun ma smra/ /mun pa chen por 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /de nas nam nangs nas shAkya ming chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras
pa/ lha dgung sangs lags te dgung bdun la dgung gcig ni thal/ dgung drug ni lus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ legs kyis zhag drug 'das na gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur bar gyur na bdag cag

nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin dong ngo / /de bzhin du dgung gcig lus so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas tshigs su bcad de
smras pa/ mi dbang shAkya'i sras po thub pa 'di/ /bdag nyid chen po pha rol phyin drug rdzogs/ /thub rnams dgyes par mdzad pa dka' thub tshal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su gshegs par
bzhed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo dang lhan cig skyes pa med pa na rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag la gzhan dag

gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir grags 'dzin ma dang / sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dgas skyes dang / bud med drug khri spangs nas rab tu byung ngo zhes gzhi des kha zer bar 'gyur du
'ong gis/ ma la bdag gis grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas des grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa dang grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan par gyur
nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ nam nangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i snyan du gsol lo snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pas tshigs su

bcad de gsungs pa/ bud med dang bdag khyim nyal ba'i/ /tha ma deng gi 'di yin te/ /phyin cad khyim du bud med dang / /nga ni lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de nas bud med de rnams gar dang glu dang rol mos dub nas kha nas kha chu 'dzag

cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas bsla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log go/ /byang chub sems dpas bud med de dag thams cad kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa

dag lhug par btang nas bsla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes nas des tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ rlung gi shugs

kyis pad ma'i tshal ltar sa gzhi 'dir/ /lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas 'gyel gyur te/ /skra rnams zhig cing 'doms dang rkub kyi phyogs snang ba/ /shAkya'i sras kyis gzigs nas rang bzhin skyo bar gyur/ /tshul

dang bral ba'i bud med na chung tshogs 'di dag /dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin 'drar mthong nas/ /sems can byis pa'i spyod pa'i yul la deng dga' na/ /sems dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yin nam ci/ /

'dod pa thams cad 'dam dang mda' mdung dug me 'dra/ /rmi lam lta bu yin te tshwa chu'i ro dang mtshungs/ /'dod pa phung byed rtsod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /mtha' ngan sbrul gyi dbang po lta bu bdag gis spang / /bar

skabs der skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i rmi lam du bzhi rmis pa/ zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang / nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bdag la phyag byas pa dang /

bdag nyid dgod cing ngu ba 'o/ /grags 'dzin ma'i rmi lam du brgyad rmis pa/ bdag nyid kyi khyim gyi gdung chag pa dang / bkra shis kyi mal khri chag pa dang / lag pa'i gdub bu chag pa dang / so'i phreng ba lhags pa dang /

skra'i lan bu zhig pa dang / dpal khyim nas byung ba dang / zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang / nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang rmi lam lnga rmis pa/ sa chen po nyid kyi gzim mal

du byas shing / ri rab ri'i rgyal po dbu rten du bcug /phyag g.yon pa shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug /phyag g.yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug /zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang /

'gring ba zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i rigs lte ba nas byung nas nam mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang / bya kun nas dkar la mgo gnag pa rnams kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas pus mo'i lha nga la thug gi bar du ldag

pa dang bya sna tshogs phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs nas mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug pa dang / mi gtsang ba'i ri'i steng nas bdag nyid mi gtsang bas ma gos par 'chag pa'o/ /rmis nas kyang thugs dgyes te dgongs pa/

nga'i rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis pas ring po mi thogs pa kho nar bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas grags 'dzin mas byang chub sems dpa' la rmi lam gsol pa/ lha da gzod bdag gis
g.yar lam du brgyad rmis pa/ bdag gi sdum pa'i gdung chag pa dang / bkra shis kyi mal khri chag pa dang / sug pa'i gdub bu chag pa dang / so'i phreng ba lhags pa dang / skra'i lan bu zhig pa dang /

dpal sdum pa nas byung ba dang / zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang / gdugs shar phyogs nas bdal nas de nyid du nub pa rmis lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas grags 'dzin ma'i yid mi bde ba bsal ba'i phyir
rmi lam rnams bshad pa/ bdag gi khyim gyi gdung chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi 'dug gam/ bdag gi bkra shis kyi mal khri chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang ma chag ste 'dug pa 'o

ni yin mod/ lag pa'i gdub bu chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa ci chag gam ma chag rang nyid rtogs shig /so'i phreng ba lhags so zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas ci

lhags sam ma lhags rtogs shig /bdag gi lan bu zhig go zhes gang smras pa de yang khyod kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas ci zhig gam ma zhig rtogs shig /khyim nas dpal byung ngo zhes smras pa

gang yin pa de ni bud med rnams kyi dpal ni khyo yin la nga ni 'dug pa nyid do/ /zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin ces smras pa gang yin pa de ni zla ba 'di mngon sum du 'dug pa ma yin nam/ nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar

nas de nyid du nub bo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni da dung yang nam phyed yod de/ re shig shar kyang ma shar na nub par lta ga la gyur ces de ltar brda sprad nas btsun mo grags 'dzin cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /byang chub
sems dpas dgongs pa grags 'dzin ma'i rmi lam de 'dra ba rmis pas gdon mi za bar da kho na bdag 'gro bar byas 'di la tshig zur gyis bstan no snyam nas des de la tshig zur gyis bstan pa dang / grags

'dzin mas gsol pa/ lha khyod gang du bzhud pa der bdag khrid cig /byang chub sems dpas mya ngan las 'das pa las dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du bya ste/ gang du 'gro ba de dang der khyod bkri'o/ /

de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /nags kyi spre'u ni spyod yul rgyu 'dra zhing / /yan par 'dug pa'i rte'u dang 'dra ba'i thugs/ /gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlog na/ /de nas shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs/ /blo gros bzang
po bzhengs shig bzhengs/ /sa ni spangs te bzhud mdzod la/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes nas ni/ /'gro ba dag ni bsgral bar mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ kau shi ka ma mthong ngam/ nga ni ri

dgas bdag po rgyas bskor ltar/ /mi ni mthu ldan gzhu mtshon ral gri thogs/ /rta glang shing rta dpung tshogs mang po yis/ /grong khyer ser skya kun nas yongs su bskor/ /zas gtsang la sogs shAkya'i tshogs

'di dag /glang chen rta zhon legs par go bgos lus/ /mi sdug sna tshogs lag na mtshon thogs te/ /khyams dang rta babs khang bzangs gzhi nang gnas/ /pho brang dang ni khyim sgo dang / /de bzhin grong khyer

sgo dag kyang / /bcad nas gtan pa dam bcug ste/ /de bzhin kun nas bsrungs par gyur/ /rwa dung pa ta ha sgra rnga sgra yis/ /khyams dang rta babs khang bzangs nang gnas shing / /glang chen rta dmag 'bad

pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/ /rgyun du nga mi btang phyir srung bar byed/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ des pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dang / /sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'jig rten 'di dang yang / /khyod kyi sngon
gyi dam bcas dgongs mdzod la/ /khab dag spongs te nges par 'byung bar mdzod/ /ji ltar khyod ni bgegs med par/ /deng nyid nags su gshegs 'gyur ba/ /bdag cag tshangs sogs bcas pa yi/ /
lha rnams kyis ni de bzhin bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpas legs so zhes gsungs nas thugs dgyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnyid kyis myos par byas nas/ gnod
sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba/ grogs po byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzangs nas 'babs kyis skas long shig /des skas blangs pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'babs pa dang /
de nas brgya byin gyis brda byas ma thag tu zha 'bring ba 'dun pa gang na ba der gshegs nas/ ji tsam na 'dun pa gnyid stug pos non par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslang nas tshigs su

bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa/ 'dun pa longs kye khyim nas myur du ni/ /nga yi rta po rin chen bsngags ldan long / /sngon gyi rgyal bas longs spyod dka' thub tshal/ /thub rnams dgyes par mdzad par nga gshegs
so/ /'dun pa gnyid log pa'i mig phye nas smras pa/ lha khyod bskyed mos tshal gyi dus ma bab/ /des pa khyod dang 'ga' yang khon ma mchis/ /khyod la dgra bo su yang ma mchis na/ /dgung phyed khyod
la bcibs pas ci zhig bgyid/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa khyod kyis lan 'ga' yang / /nga yi tshig ni ma bcag na/ /nga yi deng dus tha ma la/ /nga yi tshig 'di ma gcag shig /
'dun pas gsol pa/ gzhon nu mtshan mo 'di ni 'jigs pa dang 'jigs su rung ba mchis pas bdag bcibs pa mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ lan dang yang lan gyis gdon mi za bar skye

bo sad par 'gyur gyis bdag nyid song la rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan sta gon bya 'o snyam nas/ de nas nyid kyis pho brang gi sgo phye nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bzung bar brtsams pa na de khros pa'i me rab tu 'bar bas rkang

pa 'phra/ 'jing kyog byed la phar bros tshur bros shing 'dug tu mi btub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang / g.yung drung khyil pa
mnga' ba/ skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa/ bsngags ldan tha ma yi ni khur long ste/ /dka' thub nags su ma thogs nga skyol cig /byang chub

thob nas myur du 'gro ba kun/ /bsam gtan rnam thar char gyis tshim par bya/ /chos nyid kyis dud 'gro yang gdams na phyi lang mi byed pas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan mi g.yo bar 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

thugs dgyes pa skyes te rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bstad nas bzhes so/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyir gshegs pa'i phyir lha'i bu bzhi po bsgo ste bzhag pa/ 'gram dang /
nye 'gram dang / lo ma dang / lo ma gyon pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas de rnams la gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag nga sus bkur/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bdag cag gis bkur lags so/ /khyed cag

la stobs ji tsam yod/ gcig gis gsol pa/ gzhon nu bdag gis ni sa'i rdul ji snyed mchis pa khur du thogs te mchi 'o/ /gnyis pas gsol pa/ bdag gis ni rgya mtsho chan po bzhi dang / mtsho dang mtshe'u dang

lteng ka dang / chu mig rnams kyi chab ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi 'o/ /gsum pas gsol pa/ bdag gis ni sa la ri ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi 'o/ /bzhi pas

gsol pa/ bdag gis ni sa la rtswa dang shing dang yal ga dang lo ma ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi 'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas zhabs sa la bzhag pa na de rnams kyis bsgul bar yang ma nus
nas ngo mtshar skyes te gsol pa/ gzhon nu bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra ba mnga' bar ma 'tshal to/ /gal te 'tshal na bdag cag mi mchis pa lags pa zhig /gtam de

'dun pa sngar sad pas thos nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar song ba dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la bcibs/ 'dun pa yang 'phongs la zhon nas 'di ltar byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus rta rin po che bsngags ldan steng gi nam mkha' las mngon par 'phags pa dang pho brang na gnas pa'i lha rnams byang chub sems dpa'
dang bral bas ngu bar brtsams so/ /de rnams ngu ba'i mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams lus dang sa la bab bo/ /'dun pas gsol pa/ gzhon nu char gyi thigs pa dag 'bab na ci lhas dgung char phab bam/ byang chub
sems dpas gsungs pa/ lhas char phab pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang pho brang na gnas pa'i lha rnams/ nga dang bral bas ngu bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyi mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams lus la bab pa yin no/ /

de nas 'dun pa mig mchi mas gang zhing dbugs ring po'i shugs nar gyis phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /byang chub sems dpa' sku thams cad kyis glang po che'i gzigs stangs kyis g.yas phyogs su gzigs te

dgongs pa/ nga bud med dang lhan cig khyim na nyal ba'i tha ma ni 'di yin no snyam mo/ /yang dgongs pa gal te nga shar sgo spangs te sgo gzhan nas byung na gzhon nus ni bdag la tha ma'i dus na yang ma bltas so snyam du rgyal
po mi dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /ji tsam na rgyal po zas gtsang gnyid stug pos non pa gzigs nas des de la bskor ba mdzad de gsungs pa/ yab gus pa ma mchis pa dang / zhes ma mchis pas skrag nas

mchi ba ni ma lags te/ gzhan du na 'jig rten rga ba dang 'chi bas bcom pa rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa las yongs su dgrol ba'i slad du lags so/ /ji tsam na shAkya ming chen 'gram po

byed pa skye bo nyul zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gshegs par chas pa mthong ngo / /de nas skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di ci mdzad/ ming chen 'gro 'o/ /gzhon

nu 'di ni rigs pa ma lags so/ /ming chen gang gi phyir ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas sems can rnams kyis don du byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na da nga ci khyim na 'dug phod

dam/ 'di ni nges te dka' thub kyi tshal du 'gro 'o/ /de nas gsung tshig drag pos shAkya ming chen spyos pa dang / cho nges btab ste kyi hud/ deng du rgyal po zas gtsang dang / /shAkya dag ni thams cad kyis/ /yang dang

yang du bsams pa yi/ /re ba 'bras bu med par gyur/ /deng du rgyal po zas gtsang ni/ /sras kyi mya ngan gyis gdungs pas/ /lag bsgreng shin tu sdug bsngal zhing / /mi bzad sgra ni 'byin par gyur/ /sa 'tsho
grags 'dzin ri dgas skyes/ /de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa 'ang / /don grub dang ni bral ba yis/ /shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ /zhes smras nas/ de sngangs pas grags 'dzin ma bslang te
smras pa/ don grub 'di ni gshegs gyur gyis/ /khyim thab sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag ngur 'ong gis/ /khyim thab sdug pa de zlog shig /khyod kyis khyim thab gshegs 'gyur
'di ni mthong dka' ste/ /khyod kyis 'di ltos khyim thab mthong ba'i tha ma yin/ /kyi hud phongs pas bdag gis mtshan mo kus btab kyang / /sus kyang lan ma ster bas bdag gis ma nyes so/ /des ni
de ltar khus btab kyang / /'di ltar lha rnams byin rlabs kyis/ /dgon par 'o dod bos pa bzhin/ /'ga' yang sad par ma gyur to/ /de nas shAkya ming chen sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas gdungs nas

de rings par rgyal po zas gtsang gi drung du song nas rgyal po zas gtsang bslang ste smras pa/ don grub 'di ni bzhud lags kyis/ /sa bdag de ni bzlog par mdzod/ /sras kyi mya ngan gyis thebs nas/ /sdug bsngal

gyis gdungs bshums 'gyur mchis/ /ma stes te de yang gnyid ma sad do/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas byang chub sems dpa' gang

na ba der song ste byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing dong ste g.yas phyogs nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams spyod lam zhi ba dang / g.yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng

nas lha'i rol mo'i khyad par sna tshogs dang / mdun nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rang rang gi spyod lam gyis dong ngo / /nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i lha brgya stong phrag du mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas lha'i

me tog ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor ro/ /a ga ru'i phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra bas kyang gtor to/ /lha'i rol mo'i

cha byad sna tshogs kyang brdungs so/ /gos rnams kyang gtor ro/ /'dir smras pa/ mkha' la lha rnams ga zha'i sgra chen 'byin byed la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis gos kyi g.yab mos 'debs byed cing / /kha cig byang chub sems

dpa' la ni bstod byed de/ /nam mkha' la ni sor mo brgya phrag sgyur bar byed/ /kha cig dag ni sgo rnams 'byed byed cing / /me tog man dA ra bas 'thor bar byed/ /kha cig dag ni bcibs pa'i rkang 'dzin cing / /bde bar gshegs

pa rtog cing rjes bzhin 'brang / /kha cig dag kyang g.yas nas rjes bzhin 'brang / /g.yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rjes bzhin 'brang / /brgya byin de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa dang / /lus ngan bdag nyid shul ni mtshon par
byed/ /zla ba nya ba rgyu skar tshogs kyis ltar/ /bdag nyid chen po lha tshogs mdun bdar nas/ /dka' thub nags ni thub rnams dgyes byed pa/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su thugs dgyes gshegs/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir byung ba dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams yid dga' bas spro ba bskyed pa/ grogs po khyod yun ring po nas nam zhig na nga bgegs las thar te dka' thub

kyi nags su 'gro bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs pa skyed pa gang lags pa de deng du yongs su rdzogs pa lags kyis/ nam khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag

la yang dgongs shig /byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du bya 'o zhes dam bcas nas sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa yi/ /lam gyi mchog ni ma thob

bar/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ni slar/ /nga ni 'jug par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thun gnyis kyi dpag tshad bcu gnyis su byon nas bcibs pa las babs te rgyan bkrol nas 'dun pa la bka'

stsal pa/ 'dun pa rgyan dang rta khyer la slar song shig /'dir smras pa/ kha lo sgyur khyod nga yi rta 'di dang / /rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnyen pa dag la byin/ /nga ni 'dod pa rgya chen spangs nas su/ /da ltar 'di nyid du ni rab byung bya/ /de nas 'dun

pa gdong la mchi ma char bzhin 'bab pas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa/ seng ge stag gis bltam pa dang / /phyug rjes bltam pa'i nags tshal du/ /'ba' zhig sku gnyen dang bral nas/ /'phags pa ji ltar spyod par

'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ skye dgu 'di ni skye na'ang gcig pu ste/ /de bzhin 'chi na'ang gcig pu 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gcig pus sdug bsngal myong 'gyur gyi/ /'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no/ /

'dun pas gsol pa/ kye hud gzhon nus sdug bsngal ma gzigs te/ /zhabs 'jam glang chen rta la bcibs goms pa/ /sa gzhi rtswa dang rdo bas bltam rtsub par/ /ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs shing nags su rgyu/ /byang chub
sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'chi bdag 'jigs pa de ni lan 'ga' yang / /skyid la brtsams med bde bar goms la min/ /mgon bcas la min rigs btsun la ma yin/ /dpa' dang brtson min skye bo dga' la min/ /

dga' bas 'chi bdag 'jigs pa dag bskyed nas 'ongs par 'gyur zhes grags/ /don ma byas shing ma brtsams par/ /'chi bar yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dun pas gsol pa/ lha rgyal po bgres po ni sras kyi mya ngan

gyis 'grongs par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun pa'i tshig thugs la ma bab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas ut+pa la sngon po 'dra ba'i ral gri shubs nas phyung nas

gtsug pud bregs te steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas bkur sti chen po byas te sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer nas gtsug pud kyi mchod pa chen po btsugs so/ /bram

ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis phyogs der dbu skra blangs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te da dung yang mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag phyag byed do// //'dul ba gzhi bam po brgyad bcu bzhi pa/
byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'dun pa ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'di lta bu'i brtul ba yod pa de ci ga yang khyim na gnas par 'gyur ram/ lha ma lags so/ /'dun pas bsams pa/ gzhon nu ni
rgyal rigs kyi nga rgyal can yin pas 'di phyir bzlog par mi nus so snyam mo/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la lces bldags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i

phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba mnga' bas byugs nas gsungs pa/ bsngags ldan song shig dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas khyod kyi byas pa gzo bar 'gyur ro/ /'dun pa

la yang gsungs pa/ khyod kyis bsngags ldan pho brang du ma bkri shig /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / 'dun pa skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan khrid de yang dang yang du byang chub sems dpa'

la blta zhing song ngo / /de gnyis kyis thun gnyis kyis son pa'i sa gang yin pa de nas zhag bdun gyis phyir 'khor to/ /'dun pas bsams pa/ gal te lhan cig tu dong na smre sngags chen pos bdag shi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas

des bskyed mos tshal du 'dug nas bsngags ldan btang ngo / /des skad phyung ba dang pho brang gi skye bo dang skye bo'i tshogs gzhan gyis kyang skad de shes nas re ste phyir byung ba las byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas bsngags ldan de'i

mgul du 'dus te ngu bar brtsams so/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags phal pa gzhan la yang kun rdzob kyi shes pa yod na rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la lta smos kyang ci dgos

pas des skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra thos te dbugs khong du song ba nyid kyis brnangs te shi nas de sgra can gyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /

gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa de'i tshe de la dmu rgod kyi gdams pas gtams nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan
'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig gis dgos pa byung nas grong khyer dpe med du khyim bdag phyug po nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs
shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/

dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du khye'u bcu btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de dag thams cad

rab tu byung nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de dag gi ma rgan mo des de dag la sha na'i gos dag cig byin pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'di dag

bdag cag la mi dgos te 'on kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras gzhon nu shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba zhig yod kyis 'di dag de la phul cig /des na khyod

kyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan

las 'das so/ /rgan mo des kyang 'chi khar gos de dag bu mo la gtad nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras so/ /de'i bu mo de yang nad kyis thebs te 'chi bar shes nas des kyang shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas shing de la gnas pa'i lha

gang yin pa de la khyod kyis 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras la phul cig ces gsol ba btab bo/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des de dag shes nas blangs te/ de nas

rngon pa rgas 'khogs pa lta bu zhig tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag bgos te lag na mda' gzhu thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i lam kar bsdad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang rim gyis

lam der byon nas rngon pa lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang mi de la gsungs pa/ kwa'i nang rje sha na'i gos 'o ni dag ni rab tu byung ba la 'tsham pa yin gyis/ ka shi ka'i ras phran

'di dag khyer la 'o ni dag nga la byin cig des gsol pa/ gzhon nu bdag la gzhan dag khyod kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bkrongs nas ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos 'di dag blangs so zhes gzhi des g.yar mchi bar 'gyur lags pas bdag

'di dag mi 'bul lo/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ kye nang rje nga ni mthu ji lta bu dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes te su zhig gis nga dgrongs par nus/ khyod kyis nga dgrongs par su zhig yid ches kyis bag tsha ba

med par byin cig /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas sha na'i gos dag phul te ka shi ka'i ras phran rnams blangs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang sha na'i

gos de dag 'tsham par ma gyur pa dang de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma'o sha na'i gos rnams bdag gi sku dang 'tsham par gyur cig snyam nas tshig tu smras ma thag tu sha na'i gos de dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams

kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang 'tsham par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ da ni bdag rab tu byung zin gyis/ 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung bar

bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos de dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du ka shi ka'i mchod pa chen po btsugs so/ /bram

ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis kyang phyogs der ngur smrig blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te da dung du yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge slong dag phyag byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

dbu skra bregs shing na bza' ngur smrig mnabs te dka' thub kyi nags su phan tshun rgyu zhing drang srong ngan spong gi bu'i bsti gnas su gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe drang srong ngan spong gi bu lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems

khongs su chud cing 'dug pa de lta bu de byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas gsungs pa drang srong chen po ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug /des gsol pa/ bdag gi bsti gnas

'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu chags pa las de rnams snga mkho bzhin du ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ drang srong chen po gang gi mthus bsti gnas 'di ni shing ta la

rnams gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan pa de rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas pas so/ /gal te des rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par

mthong nas yid byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par ma gyur na/ bskyed mos tshal 'di de'i yin par 'gyur ba zhig /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong gi bus byang chub sems dpa' la brtag par

brtsams so/ /de nas gzugs bzang zhing zhi ba'i cha byad du mthong nas yun ring du brtags te ngo mtshar skyes nas gsol pa/ kye rab tu byung ba de khyod kho na ma lags grang / byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/

drang srong chen po de ltar nges so/ /de nas ngan spong gi bu ya mtshan skyes pa'i mig bgrad de bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thog mar gdan la spyan drangs te me tog dang / 'bras bu bstabs so/ /de ltar kun du dgyes
par byas pa dang byang chub sems dpas skad cig gcig bzhes nas gsungs pa/ drang srong chen po 'di nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ji srid yod/ des gsol pa/ dpag tshad bcu gnyis mchis so/ /byang chub

sems dpas dgongs pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nye 'o/ /'dir gnas pa ni rung ba ma yin te/ shAkya rnams kyis grong gi 'khrug pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gang gA rgal lo snyam nas de gang gA rgal

nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang / de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas des shing ka ra bI ra'i lo ma las lhung bzed byas nas

spyod lam zhi bas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi na 'dug pa des de 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum

pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas bsod snyoms spyod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po'i khab na rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig gnas pa la ji ltar

rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam de lta bu ni 'ga' yang med do snyam nas 'dir smras pa/ ji ltar mig can 'gro ba ltar/ /rab tu byung ba bsgrags par bya/ /'di ni brtag par mdzad nas su/ /rab tu byung ba yang dag

bzhed/ /khyim gnas 'di ni sdug bsngal te/ 'di ni rdul gyi gnas yin zhing / /rab tu byung ba bar snang ltar/ /mkhyen nas de tshe rab tu byung / /rab tu byung nas sku yi ni/ /sdig pa'i las ni spangs pa dang / /gsung
gi sdig pa spangs nas ni/ /'tsho ba kun nas dag par mdzad/ /de nas ma ga d+hA yi ni/ /grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs nas/ /mgon po shes bzhin dran ldan pas/ /bsod snyoms phyir ni gshegs pa de/ /

bzo sbyangs ma ga d+hA'i bdag /khang bzangs na ni 'dug pas mthong / /mthong nas sems dad de nas ni/ /blon po rnams la 'di skad smras/ /mtshan mchog gis ni rgyas gyur cing / /kho lag phun sum tshogs pa dang / /gnya' shing gang du lta ba yi/ /'di la

shes ldan dag ltos shig /spyan mi 'deg la yid gzhungs shing / /dman pa'i rigs las ma 'khrungs 'di/ /gang du gnas par gshegs gyur pa/ /rgyal pos pho nya rjes bzhin btang / /de nas pho nya la bsgo ba/ /dge slong de ni gar 'gro zhing / /

gang du gnas ni btab pa yi/ /rjes bzhin du ni 'brang bar gyis/ /de ni bsod snyoms gshegs pa na/ /sgo drug legs par bsdams nas ni/ /shes bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis/ /lhung bzed myur du gang bar mdzad/ /

bsod snyoms spyad pa byas nas kyang / /thub pa grong khyer phyir byung nas/ /skya bseng las ni mngon gshegs te/ /de la gnas ni btab par gyur/ /gnas btab pa ni shes nas kyang / /pho nya gcig gis bsdad byas nas/ /

gzhan ni myur du slar log ste/ /rgyal po la ni tshig smras pa/ /rgyal po chen po dge slong de/ /seng ge'am stag gi phru gu dang / /ri sul dag na gnas pa ltar/ /skya bseng gi ni steng na gnas/ /pho nya rnams kyi tshig thos nas/ /

sa bdag shing drung zhugs nas ni/ /de ni blon pos yongs bskor nas/ /myur du kho nar dong bar gyur/ /bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sar zhon te/ /de ni bzhon pa las bab nas/ /rkang gis nye bar song nas ni/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong / /

rgyal pos 'dug nas dgyes pa dang / /mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gsol nas/ /de ni ma khengs mi brlang bar/ /don 'di dag ni rab smras so/ /dge slong lang tsho dang po la/ /bab par yang dag gnas gyur cing / /'di 'dra gzi brjid

ldan pa la/ /bsod snyoms spyod pa mdzes ma lags/ /khang pa nyams dga' dag dang ni/ /bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /longs spyod mchog ni khyod gsol na/ /nyid kyi gdung ni zhu yis gsungs/ /rgyal po gangs ri nye ba na/ /

yul gyi ljongs ni nor dag dang / /'bru dag gis ni gang gyur pa/ /ko sa la zhes grags pa yod/ /bu ram shing pa nyi ma'i rus/ /shAkya dag ni de na gnas/ /rgyal po nga'i rigs rgyal rigs te/ /nga ni 'dod pa don mi gnyer/ /sa 'di ri dang bcas shing rgya

mtshor bcas/ /rin chen kun dang ldan pa bskyangs gyur kyang / /mi ni nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /so ga tsha dus shing gi me bzhin no/ /'dod pa rnams ni sha khon 'brel ces gsungs/ /mi dbang rgal bar dka' zhing 'dam rdzab 'dra/ /

sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan 'jigs pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i gtso sta blo ngan rnams kyis bstan/ /rgyal po ngas ni byung ma thag tu yang / /'dod pa rnams la mi dga'i blo bskyed na/ /'jigs byed chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa dag /bor ba de kho slar

yang ji ltar blang / /rtse mo sna tshogs yang bar gyur pa yi/ /lhun po gangs can rlung gis bskyod srid kyi/ /nga yi blo ni thar pa la brten pa/ /'dod pa'i shugs kyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /'jig rten 'di ni 'dod par bying gyur nas/ /

'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khyams pa la/ /mi dbang nga skyabs yin te gzhan med pas/ /'jigs pa che las de ni thar bar bya/ /'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mkhyen/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba gzigs/ /spang phyir gang du nga yi

yid/ /dga' ba dag tu 'gro bar bya/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol ba/ kye rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs 'dis/ ci zhig don du gnyer/ des gsungs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /rgyal pos gsol

pa/ kye rab tu byung ba gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la yang dgongs shig /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ de bzhin du bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs

nas/ rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang ha cang yang mi ring bar drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas der gshegs so/ /de rnams spyod pa dang gnas pas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te/ de rnams gang gi tshe rkang pa gcig

gis nyin thun gcig 'greng ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' thun gnyis su bzhengs so/ /gal te de rnams gdung ba lnga'i sbyor bas nyin thun gcig 'dug pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas kyang sbyor ba des thun gnyis su bzhugs so/ /

de nas de rnams ya mtshan skyes nas dge sbyong 'di ni chen po zhig go zhes smras pas dge sbyong chen po dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du
gnyer/ /de na kha cig gis gsol pa/ brgya byin nyid do/ kha cig gis gsol pa/ bdag cag ni tshangs pa nyid do/ kha cig gis gsol pa/ bdud nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ drang srong 'di dag ni

slar ltung ba lam log par zhugs pa ste/ lam de ni nus pa ma yin no snyam nas des sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /ring du 'phur

gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du kho bo tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma bdag la mi bde ba med kyis/ khyod ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/

ring du 'phur khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig rtogs par gyur/ des gsol pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur

dad pa de la ni nga yang dad la/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ltar bdag la yang brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pas sgyu rtsal

shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du chos de snyed mngon sum du byas na/ ci'i phyir bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag mngon sum du mi bya snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob

pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas te gcig pu dben pa bag yod

pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po ma thogs pa kho nar chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to/ /chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad nas yang sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/

sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /ring du 'phur khyod kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas sam/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang

ldan pa gau ta ma mad de/ bdag gis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag mngon sum du byas so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ring du 'phur bdag gis kyang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi

bar gyi chos de dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma de blta na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi yang de tsam la/ bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la 'o skol mtshungs

shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thob kyis tshur spyon 'o skol gnyi gas 'khor 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi 'o/ /de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'

la rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/ /de'i rtogs pa dag la yang dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong

bar nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas lam de nus pa med par rig nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon

nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /lhag spyod gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du nga tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /des gsol pa tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma bdag la mi bde ba med kyis khyod ci bde ba

kho nar bzhugs shig /khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig mngon sum du byas/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dad pa la ni bdag kyang

dad la rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ni bdag la yod na rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis

'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di snyed cig mngon sum du byas na bdag gis kyang ci'i phyir chos 'di dag mngon sum du mi bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa

thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas te/ gcig pu dben pa

bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po ma thogs pa kho nar chos de mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to/ /chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /

rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /lhag spyod khyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas sam/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma mad lags te bdag

gis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag mngon sum du bgyis so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa lhag spyod bdag gis kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi

bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma de lta na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi yang de tsam la/ bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la 'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra ba thob kyis tshur spyon/

'o skol gnyi gas tshogs 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi 'o/ /de nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/ /de'i shes pa

rnams la yang dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa

ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lam de yang nus pa med par rig nas gshegs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang bu'i mya ngan gyis rtag tu gdungs nas byang chub sems dpa' btsal ba'i phyir pho nya btang ba las/

des ji ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang lhan cig bzhugs pa las rgyal po'i khab nas phyir byung ste rim gro ba med par 'khyam mo zhes thos so/ /thos nas rim gro byed pa sum brgya btang ngo / /

grong khyer lhas bstan du shAkya legs par rab sad kyis kyang de bzhin du thos nas des kyang rim gro byed pa nyis brgya btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gro ba lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas dka' thub kyi nags su rgyu ba na des

dgongs pa/ dka' thub kyi nags gang bar spyod cing gnas pas ni bdud rtsi thob par mi nus kyis/ ma la bdag gis rim gro byed pa lnga zhig blangs la lhag ma ni dgye 'o snyam nas des yum gyi phyogs las gnyis/ yab kyi phyogs nas

gsum khrid de/ de rnams kyis de'i rim gro byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gro pa lngas yongs su bskor te ga yi lho phyogs na lteng rgyas 'od srung gi sde'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te byon nas de phan tshun du

'chag pa na phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/ nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/ chu klung nai rany+dza na bsil bar 'bab pa/ gse gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon po dang shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga'

ltar 'dug pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma 'o sa phyogs 'di ni dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/ nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/ chu klung nai rany+dza na bsil bar 'bab pa/ gse gu can 'jug ngogs

bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon po dang / shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig ste/ kye ma spong ba don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bus nags khrod 'dir brten na spong ba bya bar nus so/ /

bdag spong ba don du gnyer ba yin pas ma la bdag gis kyang nags khrod 'dir brten la spong ba bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nags khrod du zhugs te shing zhig gi drung du bzhugs tshems la tshems gtad/

ljags rkan la bcar nas thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsdams/ shin du mngon du bsdams so/ /de thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsdams/ shin du mngon du bsdams pas ba spu'i khung bu

thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur te/ dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin du chung ba zhig phying ka log tu bzung mngon du bsdams/ shin du mngon du bsdams na de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul 'byung ba de bzhin

du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshems la tshems gtad/ ljags rkan la bcar te thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsdams/ shin du mngon du bsdams pa na ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur

kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ sku ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub

sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgom pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di
snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i

bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang rlung thams cad spyi bo'i nang du song nas/ de de'i dbu la

dbu'i tshor ba shin du mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin du chung ba'i spyi bor lcags kyi phur pa rnon pos btab na de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin du mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin du mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ sku ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma

yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku
bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya 'o snyam mo/ /des lhag
par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/ /

de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas rlung thams cad snyan gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyus par gyur to/ /dper na mgar bas sbud pa bus na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun grwa gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyu ba de bzhin du/

byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun snyan gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyus par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ sku ma sbyangs
pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du

mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis lhag par yang rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan

dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs

rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/ shin du rgyas par gyur to/ /dper na mgar ba'i sbud pa bus na gang bar gyur/

shin du gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson

'grus brtsams pa yin/ lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa

rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms

par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba

bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang de'i tshe dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin du mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin du chung ba'i mgo 'breng bas yang nas

yang du dam du bcings na de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin du mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin du mi bzad pa skyes

kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems

dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par
bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /der lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs

pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang de'i tshe khong du khong gi tshor ba mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na ba lang gi shen pa mkhas pa

'am/ ba lang gi shen pa'i slob ma mkhas pas ba lang gsod pa'i gri rnon pos ba lang gi lto dral na de'i khong du khong gi tshor ba shin du mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan

dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na khong du khong gi tshor ba shin du mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku
bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag
par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/ /

de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang / de'i tshe sku la sku'i gdung ba shin du mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na mi shin du stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mi stobs shin du chung ba zhig phying ka log tu

bzung ste me dong gi nang du sbyangs na de'i lus la lus kyi gdung ba shin du mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sku la sku'i gdung ba shin du mi

bzad pa skyes kyang / de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa

yin no/ /byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba de lta bu'i tshor ba nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du

dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha rab tu mang po'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/

byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po gal te khyod mi'i kha zas kyis 'dzem par mdzad/ /ngo tsha bar mdzad/ smod par mdzad/ rnam par smod par mdzad na/ bdag cag gis khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas
lha'i mdangs bsgrub par bgyis te/ khyod kyis gtor cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te bdag gis mi'i zas mi bza' bar dam bcas la bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du lha

rnams kyis lha'i mdangs bsgrubs nas de bdag gir byed pa ni bdag gi brdzun yin la/ bdag gi brdzun gang yin pa de ni bdag gi log pa yin no/ /bdag gi log pa gang yin pa de'i rkyen gyis ni 'di na sems can kha cig lus

zhig ste shi nas ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi tshig ni thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs la kha zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang /

chang chung bza' ba 'am/ yang na mon sran sde'u'i khu ba 'am/ 'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba 'am/ yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba btung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe lha rnams kyi tshig thams cad kyi thams

cad du spangs nas zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba 'am/ yang na mon sran sde'u'i khu ba 'am/ 'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba 'am/ yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba gsol lo/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na yan lag dang nying lag thams cad zhum kun du zhum ste/ skem zhing bal chung bar gyur to/ /dper na ldum bu a si ta'i sdong bu dang /

ka li ka'i sdong bu 'jum kun du 'jum pas sha chung zhing skams par gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na yan lag dang nying lag thams cad zhum kun du

zhum ste skem zhing bal chung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na dbu la dbu'i lpags pa brnyis kun du brnyis te 'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur

to/ /dper na sku ba rtsa ba nas bcad na brnyis kun du brnyis pas 'khums la 'bar 'bur du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na dbu la dbu'i lpags pa rnyis kun du

rnyis te 'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu

mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su

gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song shin du phug tu song ste/ zab pa shin du zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang ngo / /

dper na khron pa zab mo'i chur skar ma'i gzugs brnyan phug tu song shin du phug tu song ste/ zab pa shin du zab par ring du song bar gtam du bya ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang /

chang chung gsol ba na spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song shin du phug tu song ste/ zab pa shin du zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang yang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ lus ma sbyangs pa

ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid

du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na de'i tshe rtsib

ma'i bar mthon dman can du gyur te/ dper na rtswa khang lo gnyis sam gsum lon pa'i phyam dgu po mthon dman du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na rtsib ma'i

bar mthon dman du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /

byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe bdag nyid gnon pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / chung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na sgal pa'i tshigs 'di lta ste/ skra'i lan bu lta bur gyur to/ /mjug do ni 'di lta ste rnga mo'i rkang pa lta bur gyur to/ /de lan 'ga' ldang bar 'dod na
