kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes tshig bla dgas su btags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/

sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ skye ba sdug

bsngal ba dang / rga ba sdug bsngal ba dang / na ba sdug bsngal ba dang / 'chi ba sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal ba dang / gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal

ba dang / mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba ste/ de yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/

yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par 'dod pa ste/ de spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/

yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de nyid ma lus par spangs pa dang / bor ba dang / bsal ba dang / zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gags pa dang /

nye bar zhi ba dang / nub pa ste/ de mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /

yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de yang bsgom par bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams la ni chos

rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gcig dang / gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong lnga sde lhag ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/
dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no/ /dge slong dag gal te gzugs bdag yin na gzugs la gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig /'di lta bur ma

gyur cig snyam du yang 'thob par yang 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag gang gi phyir gzugs bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig /

'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam du yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin no/ /dge slong dag gal te rnam par shes

pa bdag yin na rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig /'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam du yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /

dge slong dag gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig /

'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gam mi rtag btsun pa mi rtag lags so/ /mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa

sdug bsngal lags so/ /mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go/ /bdag ni 'di yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas

len tam/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag /btsun pa mi rtag lags so/ /mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal

yin nam sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa sdug bsngal lags so/ /mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go/ /bdag ni 'di yin

no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/

phyi'i 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin/ bdag ni de ma yin/ de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba de

bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ji snyed pa gang ci yang rung 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi

'am/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin/ bdag ni de ma yin/ de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji

lta ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di bdag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin par lta ba ste/ de de

ltar blta ba na 'jig rten ci yang len pa med do/ /len pa med na yongs su gdung ba med do/ /yongs su gdung ba med na bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das te bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/ /bya ba byas

so/ /srid pa 'di dag las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams kyis len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de'i tshe dgra bcom pa lnga

dang drug pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI'i 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nyi ma re re

zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pas lus snyom/ lus dub/ lus dgu bas myur du gnyid kyis log par gyur to/ /bud med de rnams kyang lus snyom/ lus dub/ lus

dgu bas myur du gnyid kyis log par gyur to/ /rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mtshan mo gnyid sad pa na bud med de dag thams cad rdol zhing sgren mor byung la skra zhig lag pa brkyang ste byung rgyal du bla ba mthong ngo / /mthong

nas kyang de rang gi chung ma la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mal chen po las babs te/ rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig gon nas nyal khang gi sgo gang na ba der song ste

phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/ /grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang / de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so/ /de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khyim gyi sgo gang na

ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/ /grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang / de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so/ /de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa grong khyer

gyi sgo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/ /grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang / de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so/ /de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags

pa 'bab chu gnod pa can gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'ong ba la yang dang yang du gzhes shing

'chag pas 'chag go/ /rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pas bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na 'chag pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dge sbyong bdag ni gtses so/ /dge sbyong bdag ni nyams

so zhes skad ngan phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu tshur shog gnas 'di ni khyod la 'tshe ba med pa yin/ 'di ni nyams pa med pa yin no/ /

de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung gcig po 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram du phud nas 'bab chu gnod pa can rgal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khrid de nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gang na ba de logs su gshegs nas byon pa dang gdan bshams pa nyid
la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag

par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod

pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/ /

gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs

pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam de rgya cher bshad do/ /

dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/

sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang / lam rtogs so/ /de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal

ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/

bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la
skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad bcu

rtsa bdun pa/ bran mo zhig de nyid kyi mtshan mo gnyid log pa las sad na gzhon nu grags pa mal chen po na mi snang bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khyim bdag gi gtso bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la

'di skad ces smras so/ /jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig /gzhon nu grags pa ni rang gi mal chen po na mi gda' lags so/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam/

g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol du khrid par ma gyur grang snyam du sems shing phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa dag bkye nas rang nyid mi lag na sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu gnod pa can gang na ba de logs su song ba dang / khyim

bdag rigs kyi gtso bos 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung gcig phud pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam g.yon can rnams kyis

phyi rol du ma khrid kyi/ 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung gcig phud pa las na gzhon nu 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs su 'di nyid nas rgal bar ma gyur grang / 'di ltar 'bab

chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung gcig bor ro snyam du bsams nas/ 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs de nyid nas rgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim

bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring po nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci nas kyang ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bus mngon par 'du bya bas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan 'di nyid la 'dug

bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du

mi mthong ba de lta bu mdzad do/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci ga gzhon nu grags pa gzigs sam/

khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang / stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/ gdon mi za bar

bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu grags pa gzigs par gyur to/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang / stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur

ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do zhes bka' stsal to snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo

bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng

bstod yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris

kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i

phyogs kyi chos rgya cher bshad do/ /gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na

shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang /

lam rgya cher bshad do/ /dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden

pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam rtogs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs de bshad pa na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba

skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad

pa de slar bsdus nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du ni chos spyad de/ /dul zhing yang dag sdom pa tshangs spyod la/ /'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ni/ /de ni bram ze

dge sbyong dge slong yin/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gzhon

nu grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu tshur shog / khyod kyi ma lus ngal zhing lus dub pas smre sngags 'don gyis khyim du 'dong / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag ji snyam du sems/ gang gis mi slob pa'i shes pa dang / mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang /
lam mngon par rtogs pa de ci ga khyim pa khyim na gnas pa 'am/ sog 'jog gi longs spyod kyis 'dod pa la spyod par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /khyim bdag ji ltar khyod
kyis slob pa'i shes pa dang / slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa de
bzhin du gzhon nu grags pas mi slob pa'i shes pa dang / mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang /
lam mngon par rtogs so/ /btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na mi slob pa'i shes pa dang / mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog

pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong grags pa dang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs na legs so/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo

bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' shams thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge

sbyong tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang / khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/
bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang
chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma

gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus

su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par

'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/ /gang gi tshe de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems

dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus pa gzigs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags

pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam de rgya cher bshad do/ /dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na mtshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan

pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa

grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan

gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so/ /bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags lags te/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/

deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags

pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la

bde bar bzhugs pa dang / gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par

byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe

dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar

mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /

dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa grags pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mchis brang gi 'khor na mchis na/

rang gi mchis brang la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag

grags pa 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags te/ 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig

gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/ 'di ltar las dge

ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang / skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu

dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can thams cad la phan par sems pa zhig gnas pa de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na mi

ro zhig mthong nas/ de de la zhen pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ bsod snyoms spyad nas slar log pa dang / ji tsam na mi ro de rnam par sngos shing rnam par bam par 'gyur ba bltas pa dang / de nyid kyi mdun du zhigs nas/

des de nyid du 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed do/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni gzhon nu grags pa 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis de na 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed de/ des na da ltar chung ma'i

nang na 'dug pa na rkyen rnyed pa yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba dang / 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren

ma yin pas dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang /

lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas

khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar

rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re shig shin du gzhon pa shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/ ma la bdag cag gis

kyang skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa

gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams bA rA Na sI nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos

phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/

rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/

bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab

tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi

bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon

sum du byas te/ bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin du rnam par

grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /bA rA Na sI'i grong mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso

bo'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste/ grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig

bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa

ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste/ grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu

rnams ni re shig shin du gzhon pa shin du bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/ ma la bdag cag kyang skra dang kha spu bregs

nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas grong gi mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag bA rA Na sI nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song

ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan

pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod

par gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med

par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /

srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug cu dang drug cu rtsa gcig

pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang

yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la yang bde ba dang /

'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing deng la khyed gnyis shing ni gcig tu ma 'gro shig /nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ /de nas bdud

sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du chos ston to/ /dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad

las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng

rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na bar rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyis/ ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i kha dog tu bdag nyid sprul

te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ ma grol grol bar 'du shes na/ /ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems/ /bdag gis dge sbyong ma bkrol bas/ /

'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te/ 'di lta ste dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka'

stsal pa/ nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /'ching ba gang yin kun las grol/ /bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par/ /sdig can de ltar shes par gyis/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis bdag gi sems

shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi rnams

kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces

bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis bA rA Na sIr ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / grong khyer sde can du byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bal can

gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig gi drung du brten te nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol du nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol

mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so/ /de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na

ba der dong ba dang / drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dad par 'os pa/ bzang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba/ zhi ba dang dul ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur gyur

pa/ dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing gi drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci ga

bud med cig gzigs sam/ gzhon nu dag bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong / btsun pa 'di ni bdag cag drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol du bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid/

dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid de/ de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol lags so/ /gzhon

nu dag ji snyam du sems/ bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang / bdag nyid tshol ba gang yin pa gang bdam/ btsun pa bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyi/ bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de 'dam lags so/ /gzhon

nu dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang khyed la chos bshad do/ /de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /

nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/ /gang gi tshe de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang /

mgu ba'i sems dang sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa

'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam de rgya cher bshad do/ /dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen

du btub pa de bzhin du drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /de nas drug

bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri

ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/

deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi na bram ze lha zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi

thugs rag por gyur pa zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig na gnyen zad/ nor zad/ 'byor pa zad par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum bcu drug bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes

brnyes pa de'i tshe bram ze lha chung ma dang lhan cig grong khyer sde can du 'ongs so/ /bram ze lhas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so zhes thos nas des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i ye shes

brnyes te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la gshegs na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul du gang gi phyir bdag gi khyim na nyi

ma gcig gi kha zas kyang med kyis/ ngas khyod gtar bcug ste kar sha pa na lnga shig skyin por blang ngo / /des smras pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig /bram ze lhas chung ma bram ze zhig la gtar bcug nas kar Sha pa Na lnga bcom

ldan 'das bshos gsol ba'i phyir skyin po'i tshul du blangs so/ /de'i chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag ni byang chub sems dpas lan 'ga' yang dri ma can dang gos ngan pa gyon pa ma gzigs so/ /bram ze lhas khyim

bdag cig las rgyan rnams brnyas nas chung ma la bskon no/ /de nas bram ze lha chung ma dang lhan cig gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze lha la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas
bcom ldan 'das bram ze lha'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas bram ze lhas bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas chung ma dang lhan cig tu

gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis bram ze lha la yon bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs so/ /de'i chung mas rgyan rnams bkrol te bzhag pa de ma byin par len pas brkus so zhes bram ze lhas thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te/ 'brog

dgon pa zhig tu song nas nga la rgyan sbyin du ga la yong gzhan byar med kyis bdag 'chi 'o snyam pa dang / ji tsam na mi zhig gis dong brkos nas song ngo / /bram ze lha ngo mtshar skyes nas de na ci yod re shig blta'o snyam pa las/ ji tsam

na rgyan de mthong nas des rgyan blangs te khyim du 'ongs so/ /lha'i chung ma yang sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas gdungs nas khyim phyag dar byed pa na 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus ji tsam na gser gyi

bum pa 'tsher bag can zhig mthong ngo / /lhas de la dris pa/ bzang mo 'o ni ci yin/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gis gser gyi bum pa zhig mthong ngo / /des kyang smras pa/ bzang mo kho bos kyang rgyan de mthong ngo / /de gnyis

kyis lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa bskyed do/ /de ltar mngon par dad pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas bram ze lha chung

ma dang bcas te 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs

mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas grong khyer sde can der

thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis nga sngon gyi sdug bsngal spong ba'i

rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na 'dis mar sar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs

so/ /grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/
bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 'di nyid la bzhugs zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /

dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan

pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng

ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang /

rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rgya cher bshad do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / /sgrib pa dang bral ba'i

sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'phags pa'i bden pa

bzhi po 'di lta ste sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam de rgya cher bshad do/ /dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin

du grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /de nas grong

pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan

gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid

'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas

kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar

rig cing / bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas

bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas

gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas yul ma ga d+ha 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de

dbang du gyur pas tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams

kyis bkur sti bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par gyur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza na'i klung gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di

snyam du dgongs te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ma la

ngas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du byas te/ 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba

der gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon/

dge sbyong chen po byon pa legs so/ /dge sbyong chen po yun ring po zhig lags na gang nas 'khor te 'dir byon/ dge sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan

bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang / bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs

gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na/ khyod kyi me khang du bdag zhag gcig 'dug go/ /

dge sbyong chen po bdag la ni mi bde ba ma mchis na/ 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te/ des khyod tho btsams par 'gyur du mchi 'o/ /'od srung khyod kyis re shig gnang bar gyis shig dang tho btsams par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong

chen po gal te khyod la tho mi 'tsham na dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas me khang gi phyi rol du zhabs bsil nas

me khang gi nang du zhugs te/ nyid kyis rtswa gding ba bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/ skyil mo dkrung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /

mthong nas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud pa phyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo / /klu gdug pas khros pa'i mthus 'bar bar byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms

par zhugs so/ /de na klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral

pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma chen po 'di ltar mdzes
pa/ klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur grang / kyi hud nyon mongs bdag gi tshig ma nyan to snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/

nga lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa chas bcad kyis/ ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na/ mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la des kyang de'i lus la gnod

par mi byed cing de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam

par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de/ dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der bsnams nas

gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig /'od srung gson no/ /

dge sbyong chen po khyod kyis lhung bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci/ 'od srung klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de ngas btul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas khyer te 'ongs so/ /

de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas

na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re'i me thab gsum gsum ste me

thab stong lnga brgya yod do/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na me de sbar bar ma nus so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas 'od

srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na zhugs de sbar bar rngo ma thog lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/

dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas pa de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig / 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na me de sbar bar rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs

na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung me de sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po sbar du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i

mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas me bsad par 'dod na me bsad par ma nus so/ /bram ze'i

khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad nas/

zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas pa de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/ /de nas

lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la

yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum par rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung me de bsad dam/

dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen

po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /

de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na sbar bar ma nus so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas

na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen

par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag nyid zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na sbar bar rngo mi thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang

snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung me de sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po sbar du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/ /de nas

lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas

na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyad nas me bsad par 'dod na bsad par ma nus so/ /

de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag nyid zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i

rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do/ /drang srong me de bsad dam/ dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/

de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che

ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig

na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye

bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgrims kyang bsad ma nus so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam

mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag
gi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims na zhugs dgum

pa'i rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung me khang de zhi bar bya 'am dge sbyong chen po zhi bar

mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge

sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung

ral pa can gyi bsti gnas nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

mgo bos phyag byas te/ de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de

nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/

dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi yod do snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar

langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir mdang sum bdag rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs

kyi phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/ /dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po

'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo/ /'od srung ci nga me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/ de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags

pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i

lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no

snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom

ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po de dag bas kyang ches lhag cing ches

'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/

kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i mdun na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu

'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig yod do snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag mdang sum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce

gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun

du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mchis so snyam mo/ /'od srung ci nga me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/ de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags

pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg pa bzhi po de dag bas kyang ches lhag

cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan

che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags

pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas me'i phung po

lnga pa de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar de dag bas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi

mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ /dge sbyong

chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i mdun du me'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa'i bar zhig yod do snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba

der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag mdang sum rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po chen po

'bar ba zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan lnga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu

'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mchis so snyam mo/ /'od srung ci nga me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/ de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po

tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar ba bzhi po de dag nas snga ma bzhin du me'i phung po chen po lnga pa de

'bar ba nas me lce gcig tu gyur pa nas sreg par byed zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de dag bas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas

'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na

lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab bo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di

snyam du sems te/ gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi/ bdag la ni de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod

kyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do/

de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa

can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin de zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs

chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de yang de la longs spyod du gzhug go snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi

sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du bzhud lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di

snyam du/ gal te ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis/

kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo / /'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon

lags/ 'od srung khyod kyis mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang

dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ dge sbyong chen po de lta lags so/ /nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems

shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no/ /dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar longs spyad du gsol/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan

che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang bdag gis khyod la chos dang 'thun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa

can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ 'od srung de'i phyir song shig nga yang 'ong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam

bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /

de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis

'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis/ gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig /dge sbyong

chen po ci bde kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /

'dzam bu'i snye ma ji lta bar skyu ru ra'i snye ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral

pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas

kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po

ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs kyis/ gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig /dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba

yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su gshegs nas lha'i bdud rtsis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te zhes

brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang nyid

kyis g.yos byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par dgongs

su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs

so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral

pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin gyis bcom ldan

'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste/ chu bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis

chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu bab pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni med na chu 'di da ltar gang nas bab snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas

'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong

ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung ral pa can 'dir khyod las ngas bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir zhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na/

nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas phyogs 'dir lag pa sa la bsnun pa las/ de nas bkod ma chen po byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba

mdzad do/ /'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra

bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyem 'phred nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag

pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs nas byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' cig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa

nas 'byung bar bzhed pa na shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo / /de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud par gyur te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /lteng rgyas 'od

srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur na/

ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di da su zhig gis btud snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen

par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon

ni 'dud par ma gyur na/ da 'di su zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung nga 'dir phyem 'phred nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i

'gram gyi mtha' gcig na na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te/ lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas 'byung bar 'dod nas shing ardzu na 'di gang na ba de logs su lag

pa brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di 'dud par gyur te/ de la nga 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /'od srung shing 'di ni ardzu na lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung

ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od

srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i

ras dag gang du bkru snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas/

brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram

du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam

du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag cig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/

rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ma mchis na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag cig brnyes so/ /de nas nga 'di snyam du

dgongs te/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te/ nga gang na ba der

'ongs te/ phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /nga 'di snyam du dgongs

te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba gzhan zhig blangs te/

nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo/ /'od srung

rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod

kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe nai rany+dza na'i chu cher brub nas bab bo/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng nas sa rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems

te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po brub pas khyer bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal lo snyam du bsams nas shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te bcom ldan 'das btsal ba

na/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng na sa rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa na 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gson nam/ 'od srung gson no/ /dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srung 'jug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas ji ltar

thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta

bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang

dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung khyod ni dgra bcom pa

ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen
po gau ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen

par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so/ /

'od srung de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shig /'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes nyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti

gnas gang yin pa der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig / bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na shes ldan dag
