gsol/ des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa re shig song la ngal sor chug shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni gsad par bsams na 'di ni bdag cag la byams par

sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po so sor rtogs par

'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te/ de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te de

rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan

sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi 'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin te/ de rnams kyis brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang brtsal bar byas pas

'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas

nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs

pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste 'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa la chags pa

dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug
lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung / mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsams so/ /khyim bdag mgon med

zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum

pa mdzad/ khyim bdag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba dang / dga'

ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang

lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dang ba drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/ dad pa

de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu

'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug ste/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu brtsigs nas yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par

byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na shul so ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/ khyim bdag

dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tsam mo/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du 'gro'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas

sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs rgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug /sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug /dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs dang rgyal

mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin du dri zhim po'i pog por dag nye bar bkod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug /sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug /dus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go/ /

de ltar tshogs bsogs nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje tshur spyon/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son pa dang / kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la/ gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam nga ba

chung ngam/ 'tsho 'am bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag

ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun spyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes kyang gsol cig jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon

med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas/ reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du 'o/ /kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med

zas sbyin gyi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun spyad

kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do/ /zhes mchi 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam

par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che'i mchog glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor

ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba

bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i

tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa

tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin du dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan

sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun

nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas

pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas/ mngon par 'du

mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg

ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar

gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /bar snang la yang lha'i rnga brdung zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog

ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gur gum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra ba rnams

'thor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang / gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to/ /dma' ba rnams

ni mthon por gyur to/ /mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to/ /glang po che yang skad 'byin to/ /rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to/ /khyim na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin

to/ /long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob bo/ /'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos so/ /lkug pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to/ /dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyis ni dbang po rnams yongs su tshang ba thob bo/ chang gis myos

pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to/ /phan tshun khon byung ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to/ /btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las

thar to/ /nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to/ /de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs

so/ /gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs

te chu'i rgyun sbreng bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa chung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa chung zad kyang byas pa med do/ /'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs

'di nyid phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig /des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi

tshal brjod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad pa na/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyi thugs kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes der ming thog mar smos par mdzad do/ /gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis

bcom ldan 'das kyis deng bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas shin du dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go/ /

de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal

gyis dge sbyong gau ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ shes ldan gau ta ma de bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che 'o zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /

yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma

bdag gis shes ldan gau ta ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che 'o zhes thos lags na/ gau ta ma gang dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag ci ga dge sbyong gau ta ma la skur pa

'debs pa ma lags sam/ thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/ shes ldan gau ta mas gsungs pa bzhin smra ba lags sam/ chos smra ba lags sam/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/ ci ga de dag gi drung

du pha rol po chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa mchis na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden pa de nga la skur ba 'debs pa ma yin/

thal bar smra ba ma yin/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/ chos smra ba yin/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa 'ongs na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas

su mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /shes ldan gau ta ma de skad gsungs mod kyi/ shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag yid mi ches

lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kye gau ta ma re shig rgan zhing rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba

can dang / mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyis

mi 'che ba lags na/ shes ldan gau ta ma 'khrungs nas ring po ma lags pa gsar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan

par mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po sbrul gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil

gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po me chung ngu khyad du gsad par mi bya/ chung ngu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dge slong gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces/ /bka' stsal nas ni bde gshegs kyi/ /de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ /ston

pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs/ /rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang / /rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la/ /blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/ /khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis/ /rgyal

srid dag ni thob gyur nas/ /chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod/ /de bas de la shin du gdung / /de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /gal te

grong ngam dgon pa 'ang rung / gang du sbrul ni mthong gyur na/ /blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/ /khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan/ /'di ltar sbrul ni rgyu ba na/ /rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la/ /glags rnyed nas ni gzhon nus kyang / /

skyes pa bud med du ma zin/ /de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /mang po sreg cing 'bar byed pa/ /lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me/ /

blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes/ /khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan/ /me ni chung ngur gyur pa yang / /rkyen las chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /mes ni ring por mi thogs par/ /grong rdal dang ni grong khyer sreg /de ltas rang

gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me/ /nags tshal sreg pa gang yin de/ /zhag 'das nas ni 'ga' zhig tu/ /

'dab ma rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi/ /dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la/ /brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa/ /de la bu tsha yod min pas/ /bgo skal spyod pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /ta la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin/ /ring por mi thogs

rabs kyang 'chad/ /de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang / /de bzhin brang 'gro me dang ni/ /dge slong tshul

khrims ldan de la/ /blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya/ /de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de la khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /de nas go sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom

ldan 'das gyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu

rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ /khyod kyi sras gyis bdud rtsi thob nas

bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring ba rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo / gnyis pa btang ba dang / de yang de nyid du rab tu phyung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag

de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab

tu byung ngo snyam mo/ /sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon

nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes smra'o/ /

da ni kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang phrin yig khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchi ste bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang

gis smras pa/ 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug pa 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ /'char kas smras pa/ lha slar mchi

lags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa/ lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/ /khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te/ /nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/ /rgyal ba ljon shing la bsdad na/ /

da ni khyod kyi slob ma yi/ /yal ga lcug ma 'phel 'gyur bas/ /gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan/ /gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na/ /bdag gi bu ni

'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te/ /bu gcig yul mi 'bras bus yongs su spyad thob na/ /de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med/ /gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na/ /nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams

ni/ /shin du che dang phan gdags zhes/ /khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas ni/ /khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyes na/ /bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la/ /thugs brtses rjes su zung mdzod de/ /gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad

du gsol/ /zhes spring ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis gnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol
ba'i yi ge lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas klags so/ /klags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka 'dod do/ /'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal

te mi bzhud dang / bdag gis mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing / /sred 'gags bkri ba yong ba ma yin

pa'i/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing / /sred 'gags bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi

rtsal mnga' de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing / /'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ /gzhi med na ni

gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing / /'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /lan la spobs
pa med nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang la rig par bgyi'o/ /'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no/ /'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/

rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung shig /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin

du gyis shig /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang / yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go/ /

'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rab tu

phyung shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te kun du spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/ 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya

ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag go/ /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas

te song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka song la khyod mod kho nas rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgo na sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /zhugs nas gal te nang du spyon cig ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas gal

te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byed 'di 'dra 'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /khyod kyis rgyal

po'i khab du yang gnas par mi bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes gleng na/ mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang

du 'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na/ byon no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /ji srid cig na byon

zhes 'dri na zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song shig /sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te/ /lha rnams bsams pas 'grub 'gyur

zhing / /de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyis/ /sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub/ /bcom ldan 'das gyis 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char

ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzod pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsrung nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang

yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do/ /de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thong shig /de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung ngam/

des smras pa/ lha rab tu byung ngo / /khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam/ 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas chos 'dul ba legs

par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyi 'khyud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de bzhin du chu btsags rtsa ba dang 'bras bu

brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang / dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yongs su longs spyad do/ /rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo

mtshar skyes te smras pa/ 'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra ba nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so/ /dper ji lta bu ri rab dang

yungs 'bru bzhin no/ /rgyal mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no/ /nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no/ /nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang

'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar byung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 'char kas

smras pa byon no/ /dus ji srid na dgung bdun lon na'o/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor byos shig /'char kas smras pa/

lha bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do/ /rgyal pos smras pa gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin tshe dang

ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu

drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu chug shig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang

phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom

na khyod cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces sgo shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa

dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor

grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom la 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs gyis bskor ba lta bu/

glang po che glang po phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs

kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan mgron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams

kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor lo sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor

ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor

ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin

du dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis gyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i

'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs

gcig tu 'bab chu ro hi kar byon te/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi kar byon to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang gyo mo dang gseg ma rnams bsal

nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/ dar gyi chun phyang mang bo dpyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ka nas gang yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs

shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go/ /de na 'bab chu ro hi ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed do/ /kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed do/ /kha cig ni khrus byed do/ /ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon

nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab

kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na/ shAkya nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad

grub pas bka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas ltogs po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te dus de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas da zhabs kyis gshegs pa

lta zhes ma dad pa skyed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang bzhengs pa dang bzhugs

pa dang mnal ba mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang ser po

dang dmar po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel gyi kha dog go/ /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston pa mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad de sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/ /sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang

mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus

te ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi

srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das drug srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams

bzhi'i srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams

mi gang lhag tsam na 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong rnams sa la 'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te

rmongs par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na de la gzhon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras

pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/ /'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed de nyid don ni kun du ston mdzad lags/ /'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs

bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ /dri med gsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang da gzigs shig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te tshigs su bcad

pas gsol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ /bltams pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang / /'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/ /de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis

rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'thug pa mthong nas da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad

ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa na sa chen po g.yos pa gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams

cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun gnag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin

pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/ shes ldan

'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so/ /gang gis tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/ zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na

shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i

bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i

tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas bcom ldan 'das gyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so/ /de bas na 'di skad ces/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la

'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ /bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang / /'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o zhes smra 'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor

brgya stong phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing snying dang mig mchi mas gang bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs

kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las/ /yab gyi khab na bzhugs pa las/ /dgon pa'i 'jigs dang bcas rnams su/ /ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang du ni/ /

khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba/ /'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus/ /thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ ba so gser gyi rtsa ba can/ /shin du bde ba bting ba yi/ /khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las/ /gding ba la ni ji

ltar mnal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni/ /dga' ba byang chub yan lag ni/ /me tog bkram par chags med cing / /yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol

pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni/ gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ /rnyog pa can la dro ba yi/ /chab gyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med/ /bsod nams 'jug

ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas/ /lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba/ dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yi/ /tsan dan gyis ni sku bkrus shing / /ka shi'i mchog gnas

mdzes pa las/ /de dang bral na mdzes ma lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin te/ /tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin/ /gser dang nor bu rna cha dag /rmongs skyed nga la ci zhig bya/ /rgyal pos gsol

pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na/ /glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa/ /tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la/ /zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang / /yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa

yis/ /sa kun rnam par rgyu na yang / /nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i/ /na bza' mnabs na mdzes pa las/ /ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa/ /ji ltar khyod

kyi sku yis bzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po nga yi gos ni ngo tsha shes/ /nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te/ /de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams/ /nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar

khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa las/ /du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las/ /'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni/ /phal ba gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs

nas ni/ /nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i/ /nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi/ /'jig rten kun la brtse phyir nga spyod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/ /dgun skyems kha ra'i chab

gsol na/ /rnyog pa can la dro ba yi/ /chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na/ /bdag la btung ba thams cad ni/ /dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa/ /chos kyi ro mchog nga btung ngo / /rgyal

po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang / /khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs/ /da lta gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa/ /blo bzangs ji ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin te/ /dri ma bag chag bcas par ngas spangs pas/ /nga ni myang ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te/ /nga la 'di na 'jig pa cung zad med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang

gis gsol pa/ khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ong bar/ /khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na/ /gcig po khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/ /thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

rtsal pa/ gau tam chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa/ /tshul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas/ /lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ gang gis khyod ni

khyad du gsod/ /gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye/ /yid 'byung ba yang gang las skye/ /zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis nga yi khyad gsod dang / /gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang / /gang

las yid 'byung skyes pa dag /nyon cig khyod la bshad pa bya/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste/ /gal te 'di gsum yod min na/ /nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/ /yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol

pa/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba/ /legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs/ /khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/ /ji lta bur yang ma gos so/ /de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni/ /thub

pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ /bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gi bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do

snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri

bdun stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so/ /lha sbyin nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can/ sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas

pas smras pa/ /gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed pa shes na bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig /de la shAkya rnams kyis bshes pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu

che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs pa bre bo zas la sogs pa

shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/ /ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud

rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/ /'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gi ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /

kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig

phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig

gis ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag kyang phal cher kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar

bcas pas mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/ da lta ni mis mchod kyi lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyi/ /char pas

'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad do/ /mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin

no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam pa las de 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu

che ba yin no snyam ste lhag par dga' bar gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go/ /rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba 'o/ /de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin du

dga' ba yod kyis/ ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang / shin du dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang

la soms shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi

bu chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/ maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so/ /btsun pa maud gal

gyi bu chen po gang na bsams pa nyid la bzhugs shig /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las

mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par

byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang /

leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go/ /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/ lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ /lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed la lus gyi stod

nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi

bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan

'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang / /sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / /zag zad

dgra bcom gang yin pa/ /thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu

byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas de shin du dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs

na lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das

kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das

kyi dgongs pa mi shes na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig

rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas/ des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa

la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa rtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig /kau shi ka khyod kyi mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las

mnyan te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa rtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhi na 'khod pa'i yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar phyogs

na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub khor dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /

byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya sbyin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas

par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la

bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor

skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /yul 'khor

skyong gis smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/

bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes po'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas

gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /mig mi bzangs

gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo / /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi

bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug pa sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig /rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan

'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de bdag gis blta 'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so/ /de nas

rgyal po zas gtsang zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na khrag dron mo skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod

pas de la thabs shig bsham par bya 'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang / des na rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par

mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /

khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes

bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la phas ma bgyis/ mas ma lags rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags

sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyi ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags sdug pa dang / rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i

ri bo dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag go/ /yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan gdags pa/ /dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang / /khyod kyis bdag la

mdzad lags te/ /sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis/ /khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/ /drangs te mtho ris thar pa la/ /bsgrib mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te/ /khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs/ /mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni/ /

bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar/ /mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yi/ /longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud

de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas

gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/ zas

dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu khyod rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig /ci'i slad du ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so/ /gang gi gdugs la lags/ de ring kho na 'o/ /

bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang / lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /

des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer

cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ /gal te de ltar gyur na da su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag /

de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'

ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la

bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po zas

gtsang gi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig

nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ /rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad

pa/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis/ /shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi/ /yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni/ /rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /

de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni

rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/ nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na dka' thub drag po'i brtul zhugs

kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/ lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis

bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las/ des bsams pa/ shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/ de nas shAkya thams cad bsogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na

cir 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci

rab tu 'byung ngam/ rab tu byung shig /ci thams cad dam/ khyim re nas re re 'o/ /bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis

khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/ /bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang / ming chen no/ /ming chen ni zhing blas kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no/ /ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug

nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /ming chen la mas smras pa/ /bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgos khyod rab tu

byung shig /des smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung shig /bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig /yum khyod

gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod/ de ring de la chung zad kyang ma bskur dang / ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po legs sam ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro/ /bu de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o/ /

des gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri dang ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig /des de

la khyer nas song ba dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/ rang sangs rgyas kun shes pa la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya/

de'i zan sbyar bar bya 'o zhes des rdze'u de rnams su sran tshod dang / tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang zas kyis bkang ngo / /ji tsam na mngag gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang / des smras pa/ bu mo 'o na ni ci yod/

des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so/ /ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci ste bskur/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re shig blta'o zhes

ci tsam na kha phye ba dang / bskyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/ de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so/ /de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas spring ba/ yum gdugs

re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu sha stag bskur ba'i rigs so/ /des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/ des ming chen la bstan nas/ bu mthong ngam/ yum mthong lags so/ /khyod la kho mos sngar bsod

nams kyi dbang thang chen po'i sems can mi skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/ des smras pa/ yum bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes

ji ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu byung bas khas len du ma btub bo/ /de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na khyod ci

rab tu 'byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'dug /des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs

na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyim par 'dug ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi thob bo/ /ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas

'thob bo/ /yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu legs kyis de bzhin

du gyis shig /ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo / /de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi bang len te/ de pi bang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to/ /ma 'gags pa pi bang len pa la byang

ba yin pas des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de sgor bsdad de sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig /

sgo srung song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/ lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog /shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong shig /

de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po la byung nas 'dug tu bcug ste smras pa/ khyod 'ongs nas ji srid lon/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyod pi bang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa na'o/ /de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas des smras pa/ khyed pi

bang len pa la byang ba yin no/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig par bsgo

bas de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste/ gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid tu gnas thob shig /de de nyid du gnas btab bo/ /mal 'cha' bas rims bag gi dri

can gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang / de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su tshor nas smras pa/ ci 'di'i 'og na rdo phre'u yod dam/ de rnams kyis brtag

par brtsams pa na me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /ma 'gags pa mtshan mo mi bde bzhin nyal nas nam nangs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ma 'gags pa ci ga bde bde bar gnyid log gam/

des smras pa/ lha bde bar gnyid ma log go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog gi sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus gnad lags so/ /

rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste ci bya/ mal 'cha' bas smras pa/ lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so/ /rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis rims

bag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya/ des smras pa/ lha bdag la tha ga pas gtad pa lags so/ /rgyal pos thag pa bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos dbul/ tha ga pas smras pa/ lha snam bu 'thag

pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri lags so/ /rgyal po

mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur te/

de shAkya rnams la gnod par byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la lha sbyin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste/ de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/ lha sbyin kho bo cag

thams cad rab tu 'byung na khyod ci byed/ lha sbyin gyis bsams pa gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs cig bsham par bya ste bslu'o/ /gzhan yang

bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa/ ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang bya'o zhes bsams

so snyam nas smras pa/ khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyis dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal pos tshig de

glegs bu la bris nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung

bar 'gyur gyis/ thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba skyed cig ces bsgo 'o/ /lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung ba shes par gyur

dang bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ nga ni gal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam cis rab tu byung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal

srid bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas des grong khyer gseg ma dang gyo mo bsal/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

bsgreng / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/ shin du dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag /me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du bcug go/ /de nas shAkya brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo na seng

ge'i khri la 'dug go/ /shAkya mo dang shAkya gzhon nu ma ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung khol ma can dang / skar khung dang / stegs bu dag la 'dug go/ /shAkya rnams kyi 'byor pa la blta bar 'dod pa'i skye bo'i tshogs yul sna tshogs

nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che 'am/ tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su 'dug go/ /shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/ su dag gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa'i phyir bram ze dang / mtshan mkhan

dang / ltas mkhan dag bkug go/ /shAkya rnams do shal dang / gdub bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang ma dag la bltas nas so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ shAkya'i rgyal po

bzang ldan sna la byung ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ re shig 'dis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba na de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams

kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas lha sbyin phyir byung ste/ de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal

ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /ko ka li ka dang / khaN+Da s+dzas kyi dum du dra bya dang / ka Ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams phyir byung ba dang bong bu'i skad grag nas de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis bstan pa/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos

chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang / de glang po che las babs te/ blangs so/ /de yang de rnams kyis lung

bstan pa/ 'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams bskyed mos tshal du dus ston

la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung na kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par

'gyur/ kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/ mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma yin pas ma la ngas thams cad dge slong rnams

kyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu 'byung ba

dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu

'byin pa na skra 'dreg par btang nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'breg pa na de ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag la skad 'dzer cing dbugs brdzags par skra 'breg par byed do/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar

'khor ci'i phyir du/ de snying rje rje skad du bcom chung ngu dal bus tshig re nas smras pa/ lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa mi phal pa rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig /

khyed kyis spangs te gson pa bas ni 'gum mi bsdo'o/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te/ chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig /ngas ji ltar mi phal

pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas des phyogs gcig tu ras shig bting nas shAkya gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig /'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag

cag la bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog shig /de rnams kyis se mo do dang / do shal dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa

rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so/ /nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang / des bsams pa/ re shig

gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur

ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par

bya ba zhig snyam mo/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas tshe

dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nye bar 'khor

khyod ci'i phyir shin du mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la

bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang

legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sems khongs su

chud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin/ rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa

ma yin te/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/ /rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad/ /'das nas yun rings lon pa yi/ /las rnams la ni rtog

par mdzad/ /gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshur bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong dang / khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur

ro// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ des khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal

lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod

cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag par lhung bzed dang bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen

par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /

sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams ni rgan rabs ji lta bu bzhin du 'dud par byed pas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na/ nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so/ /
de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na/ ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang 'dud par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spang ba'i

phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rgan gyis khyod kyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa chog la thud cig /des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/

ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na ni shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na ni byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na

mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbu dma' bar gyur te/ de ltar thams cad kyis rim bzhin du gtugs so/ /lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis

thud cig /des gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis shes de 'dud du ma btub ste/ der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lha sbyin gyis bcag go/ /dge slong rnams the tsom

skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor la phyag bgyis pa dang sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa la gzigs/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos

pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du bcug go/ /de'i tshe bA rA Na

sI'i grong khyer na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i drung du bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' zhes bya ba song nas smras pa/ bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog /des smras pa/ khyod la kAr Sha pA Na lnga brgya yod dam/

des smras pa med do/ /song la kAr Sha pA Na lnga brgya khyer te shog shig /de la 'byor pa med kyang de de la lhag par chags pas dus dus su me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs skyel bar byed pa dang / de de la sdug pa skyes so/ /ji tsam dus

gzhan zhig na bA rA Na sIr dus ston byung nas bud med thams cad gos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas rang gi khyim na rtse zhing dga' ba mang pos gnas pa de bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dgas mthong nas yi chad par gyur te/

smad 'tshong ma bzang mos bsams pa/ de ring bA rA Na sI'i mi rnams gos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur na/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' su zhig dang dga'

mgur spyod par 'gyur zhes de de snyam du sems shing bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des de mthong ba dang / sngon gyi byas pa drin du gzo ba yid la bskyed nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u song la shin du dri

zhim pa'i me tog dag khyer te shog shig /bdag cag lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/ /de shi ba las sos pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ngo mtshar gyis bsdus nas song ngo / /de'i gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / g.yer ba'i yon

tan brtags nas mos shing zhen pas mtshan thog thag gnyid ma log pas nam nangs pa dang mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin du lci bar gyur nas/ ji tsam nyi ma shar gyi bar du gnyid log nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi dus ston gyi ched du me

tog thams cad btus zin pa de'i tshe sad nas me tog gi ched du phan tshun song ba na ma rnyed nas/ des shing shiR+Sha zhes bya ba'i me tog cig khyer nas de'i drung du song ste tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ g.yang gzhi thogs pa bu pho mdzes dga' ni/ /

ma sha phyed med rgyud gzhan snyom las kyis/ /de ring shing rnams me tog rgyas dus na/ /sbyin pa'i me tog shi R+Shad 'di yin no/ /des smras pa/ song la me tog gzhan dag khyer la shog shig /'dod pa rnams la so sor rten par byed pa

ni kun du sbyor ba la sogs te/ de'i 'dod chags rab tu 'phel bas so ka'i zla ba'i tha ma'i nyin par sprin med cing rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi dus na grong khyer nas shin du thag ring ba'i yul dgon pa dag tu mgo 'dren pa dang dkyus

ma dag dbyangs su len cing me tog thu'o/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ri dgas 'chor du chas pa na de nyi ma'i gzer rnon pos gdungs nas grib ma'i ched du phyogs der son pa dang / de'i glu'i sgra thos nas tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ steng

nas nyi ma gdung byed cing / /'og nas bye mas gdungs pa la/ /glu len khyod kyi lus la ni/ /ci phyir nyi ma'i gdung ba med/ mdzes dga'as kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni nyi mas ma gdungs te/ /rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs

lags/ /bya ba bya ba ma yin pas/ /'jig rten 'di gdungs nyi ma min/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar bsil bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yin te/ des na nyi ma phyed kyi tshe 'dug nas me

tog thu'o snyam nas/ des bkug ste smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re shig bsil bar byed pa'i gtam dag byos shig mnyan to/ /des bsams pa/ rgyal po de ni gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa yin te/ des na 'di skad smra'o snyam nas/

des bsil bar byed pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs de la smras pa thos nas rgyal po lus gdung ba dang bral bar gyur to/ /rgyal po mngon par dga' bar gyur nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas

dbang bskur ba'i srog sbyin pa gang yin pa de la lan du phan ci gdags/ lha rgyal srid phyed kyis so/ /de nas rgyal po des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas thob cig dang / sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbyin no/ /de rgyal po'i
