mi 'chor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba ste gnas lnga rnams la yang byang bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos

'dod pa/ skye dgu rnams la byams pa/ thams cad rab tu gtong ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/ gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin te/ de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos na dpag tshad brgya nas kyang

don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ong ste/ thams cad kyang yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo / /de nas re shig cig na byang chub sems dpa' shing rta nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / byi ru dang / bai dUr+ya dang / spug dang /

pad ma rA ga dang / in dra nI las 'bar bar byas pa/ tsan dan mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/ seng ge dang / stag dang / gung gi lpags pas g.yogs pa/ rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa/ gser dang dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra

'khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas grong khyer dam pa nas bskyed mos tshal du song ngo / de nas bram ze'i rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsu nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu

khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /yang smras pa khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ /thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ /bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di/ /khyod kyis sbyin pa gtang bar rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad sgrol shing rta de las myur ba myur bar babs te snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas bram ze de dag la shing rta de byin nas smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/ /mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa

gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba me tog kun da dang / pun da ri ka dang / kha ba dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gyur pa/

rkang lag legs par gnas pa/ glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ skal ba mchog gi mtshan can/ bsod nams byas pas mthong ba la zhon nas shin du sdug pa'i bran dang / mdza' bshes dang / g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang

zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du so ka'i dus la bab pas shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags

tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang / de nas phyir rgol bas rbad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur

cig /yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/ /khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni/ /bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po

che'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po che'i mchog de byin nas smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/ /mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang / /de bzhin

bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol gyis glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol bas sbad pa'i bram ze rnams la byin no zhes thos so/ /

thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen shin du khros 'khrugs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bkug ste smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song shig /de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol phas spangs pa dang bsams pa/

bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas glang po che de yang btang ste/ de bas khyim na gnas pas ni/ /ci nus pas ni sbyin pa btang / /dka' thub nags su brten

nas ni/ /nges pa mchog dag bya ba yin/ /bslangs na mi sbyin bya ba yi/ /tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyi/ /de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te/ /dka' thub nags su rab tu 'gro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas

chung ma rgyags byin ma'i drung du song ste de dag rgyas par smras so/ /de nas rgyags byin ma thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rje'i sras gal te de ltar na bdag kyang dka' thub kyi

nags su mchi ste/ bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral na skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang / /ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang / /pad ma chu yis stongs par gyur pa dang / /

bud med khyim thab kyis stong de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin no/ /khyod ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / bgo ba mchog la goms

pas lus shin du skyid de ba yin/ dka' thub kyi nags na ni rtswa dang lo ma bting bar ni nyal/ rtsa ba dang me tog dang / 'bras bu ni za/ rtswa dur ba dang / zug rdo dang rtswa dang / tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni rgyu/ yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni sten/ bdag nyid skye

bo thams cad la ni bsten dgos/ glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni 'bad dgos la/ de na yang nga gdon mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so/ /de bas na re shig da dung yang legs

par soms shig rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag rngo ci thog gis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de dag khyod kyis dran par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i

drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/ yab cig bdag gis sbyin par glang chen stsal/ /nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol/ /bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchi lags kyi/ /mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/ /de nas rgyal po bu dang

bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs kyis brnangs te skad 'dar 'dar pos smras pa/ bu sbyin pa'i blo bor la 'dug shig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri dang bcas par yang / /gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yis/ /sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa

las/ /sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/ /zhes smras nas song ngo / /de nas bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin du

song ngo / /de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas mi zhig la dris pa/ kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di cho nges 'debs pa ci las gyur des smras pa/ shes ldan

ci mi shes sam/ 'di ltar mi yi dbang po nyid kyi sras po mche ba bzang / /brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di nas spyugs/ /de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chas pa la/ /pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin du snying rjes cho nges

'debs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor ba rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag slar deng shig /slar deng shig /'di ltar shin du yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa

yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te/ gnyen gyi skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo

dbang med de/ /mdza' ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur bsams nas/ /khyed kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan pa gyis/ /de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze

zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/ khyod kyi shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs

so/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes te tshig brlang pos bram ze de la smras pa/ e ma'o nags na 'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang / /bram ze 'di ni shin du brtse ba med pa'i blo/ /mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/ /'di la 'dir

ni snying rje ci ga mi skye 'am/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyags sbyin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na/ /kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob/ /sbyin

sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas

smras pa/ bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa/ /shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir/ /bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i/ /zag med chos kyi shing rta che skor shog /de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog

de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu mdog gnag phrag pa la khyer/ rgyags sbyin mas ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang rim gyis dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to/ /de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub

kyi tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so/ /ci tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags su song ba dang bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs

gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /bdag cag bkol pa ma mchis pa/ /spa shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na/ /de yi don du bus pa gnyis/ /khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad sgrol bu sdug pa gtong ba la chung shig sems shing 'dug pa dang / de nas bram ze de byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na 'di ltar khyod

la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod/ /khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi/ /bdag nyid can du sa steng grags/ /ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze de la smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po/ /rang gi srog ni gtong ba la 'ang / /lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na/ /rang gi bu ni gtong ba la/ /bdag blo gzhan du 'gyur ci smos/ /bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/ bdag

gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i/ /bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na/ /ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ /'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/ /gzhon nu shin du brtse med pas/ /bus pa btang la bdag min zhes/ /kha cig bdag

la 'phyar 'ong gis/ /bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/ /de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ /srog chags

thams cad la snying rje brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stis spos kyi glang po lta bu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / blo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa/ skye bo bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang /

mgon med pa dang / ltogs pa yongs su sdug pa thams cad kyi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs na nom pa med pa 'am/ lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa 'am/ mthong na don med pa 'am/

re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/ khyod kyi med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta bstabs na myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na khyod kyis

bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas btang ba'i rigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing bza' mig mtshungs med pa/ /ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/ /grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la

btsal byas kyang / /mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas bu la chags pa'i slong bas 'di dag sems par byed de/ gal te re shig

bu gnyis po/ /bram ze byin na bu dang ni/ /bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag /bdag dang rgyags sbyin gyis 'thob 'gyur/ /'on te 'di la ma byin na/ /brtul zhugs las kyang nyams gyur cing / /bram ze 'di ni tshi chad de/ /

ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro/ /nyes na bu bral nyam thag pa'i/ /mya ngan sa steng bdag gis blang / /de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa/ /zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol

gyis sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par btang bar chad nas smras pa/ kye kho bos dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi/ /rgya mtsho chan po so sor 'jigs byed pa/ /gting mi dpogs par rab tu bying ba dag /pha rol

bsgral phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'/ /zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can/ /ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas/ /mchi ma'i brlan chus mig ni gang gyur pas/ /byis pa gnyis po bram ze de la byin/ /yang smras pa/

bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas/ /des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya/ /byis pa gzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas sa g.yo

ba des nags de na gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams sngangs nas phan tshun smras pa/ sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur pa/ /'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin/ /gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba/ /shin du bsal bar shes par bya/ /de na gnas 'jog dang rus

gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/ gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags su 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba yid du 'ong ba'i mig tu sdug par

byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa/ yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir btang ste/ de nas sa g.yos par gyur to// //'dul ba gzhi/ / bam po brgya pa/ de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs

su btang ba'i blo rig nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab cig yum ni ma mchis par/ /khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa/ /re shig de ni mthong gyur nas/ /de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu dag nga'i snying du mi sdug min/ /snying brtse snying rje med min te/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /yon tan mthong nas btang ba

yin/ /ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog /zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i/ /rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo/ /de nas byis pa gzhon nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas pha'i rkang pa gnyis

la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang sma bab pa'i tshig gis dal gyis smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na/ /ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi phrin/ /khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces/ /yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol/ /

yab gzhan yang byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa gang / /gal te la lar thugs la mi bab tshig 'ga' smras pa 'am/ /gus par mnyan pas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa/ /de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod pa mdzad du

gsol/ /de skad ces smras nas pha la phyag 'tshal te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin bla ma la smra bar yid la gcags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis

pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin du snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas yid kyi byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so/ /byis pa gzhon nu dag dong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /lha stong phrag du mas yang bar snang la ca co dang ga zha'i sgra 'byin cing / e ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che/ /byis pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang / /gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa/ /de ni nges pa rmad cig go/ /de nas rgyags

sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas logs su chas pa las sa che thang du g.yos pa des myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de nyid du song ba dang / lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' sems can thar bar bya bar brtson pa byas

pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang rgyags sbyin mas ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/ ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/ /

kho mo lam 'dir bkag nas ci ste 'dug /ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo nges gyur na/ /lam las bzur te myur du 'gro bar gyis/ /gzhan yang khyod kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma la/ /bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/ /btsun mo yin pas

chos kyi spun gyur gyis/ /ri dgas rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye shig /de skad ces smras pa dang lha seng ge mo'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo / /de nas rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi shis pa'i ltas dag mthong

nas yud tsam zhig bsams pa/ ji ltar bar snang la ngud mo'i sgra grag pa dang / ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra grag pa las na gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to snyam nas

smras pa/ ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang / /ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang / /ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las/ /bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/ /ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa dang / /bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang / /ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba las/ /bus

pa de yang btang bar nges/ /zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti gnas su zhugs te/ mi dga' bzhin bltas na bu de gnyis ma mthong nas de nas rmongs shing snying 'dar bas bsti gnas kyi gzhi

de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/ phyogs 'di na ni gzhon nu mdog nag sring mo dang lhan cig ri dgas kyi phru gu dang lhan cig rtag tu rtse rtse/ 'di ni de gnyis kyis sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/ 'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed mo'i cha byad yin na de gnyis ni

mi snang na gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal lta srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re shig bu mthong bar 'dod pas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab

kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo de gnyis gang du mchis/ /thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig /re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur na/ /bus pa de gnyis de la byin/ /de la rjes su yi rang

gyis/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyags sbyin ma ri dgas mo mda' dug can gyis phog pa bzhin du sa la sgyel nas nya chu'i gnas nas phyung ba bzhin du 'gre ldog par byed/ khrung khrung bu stor ba bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad du ngu / ba be'u shi ba bzhin

du ni 'ba' sgra sna tshogs 'don cing smras pa/ pad mo gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhin can/ /lag pa pad ma'i mda' ltar gzhon sha can/ /bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba/ /'gro ba gang du song nas sdug bsngal gyur/ /ri dgas bu ltar drang

zhing ri dgas tshig /ri dgas lhan cig bsti gnas dga' ba na/ /de ring bdag gi bu gnyis ji lta bur/ /gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur/ /mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni/ /snying rjes ngu bas shin du sdug bsngal ba/ /de ring

bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas/ /skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho/ /de gnyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyed pa/ /zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za/ /bzod dang gnas pas bla ma rtag dga' bas/ /bdag gi bu gnyis shin du sdug

bsngal lo/ /de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang / /rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lums spangs pa las/ /skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas/ /bdag gi bu gnyis shin du sdug bsngal lo/ /skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na/ /de gnyis

su yi dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bran du gyur pas gdon mi za bar ni/ /de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongs su zin/ /bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ /srog chags sdug pa brgya dag phral ba yi/ /sdig las shin du mi bzad

'dir byas pa/ /des na ba be'u med bzhin cho nges 'debs/ /bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang / /sems can kun la yid ni mnyam gyur pa/ /bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po/ /bran du gyur pa las ni thar bar shog /de nas

rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrungs pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib be 'dug par mthong nas snying du sdug nas 'khyud de smras pa/ /bus pas ril ba chung ngu'i chus bcus pa/ /lo ma rnams la chu thigs 'dzag

pa yi/ /ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin/ /bus pa nu zho ma blud lta bur ngu / /yang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal

bus smras pa/ de'i ne'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang / /gnas su sa tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa/ /ri dgas phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang / /bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der

rjes bcad pa dang / bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis rjes drang por ma byung gi gya gyus gang bar mthong nas lhag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa/ ji ltar 'then pa'i rjes byung dang / /la lar myur du song ba las/ /brdegs te khrid par gdon mi za/ /

kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog /mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzags shing skad kyang 'dzer/ /ma mchu mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu/ /ri dgas bzhin du mig kyang rig rig ste/ /rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/ kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis/ /btang ba ma yin sdang bas min/ /sems can kun la

phan don du/ /btang bar dka' ba'i bu de btang / /mchog tu btang dka' bdag nyid dang / /bu dang chung ma rnams btang nas/ /sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du/ /byang chub mchog ni thob par gyur/ /rgyags sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la

brten gtang dka' ba'i/ /bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang / /bdag dang chung ma gzhon nu nor yang gtang bya ste/ /kun la thams cad btang ba'i blo gros nga la yod/ /de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brtan te/ byang chub sems

dpa' la smras pa/ khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis/ /khyod blo gzhan du ma 'gyur cig /gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhed na/ /dogs pa ma mdzad bdag stsol cig /gzhan yang dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi mi/ /sdug pas chags pa btang ba yi/ /don de

myur du thob nas ni/ /srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang / rgyags sbyin brtson 'grus shin du rmad du byung ba dang / shin du bya dka' bar rig nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i

tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ steng gi nam mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags nas snang ba rgya chen pos gnas de gsal bar byas te/ nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo ngan

gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can/ /longs spyod la chags snying gi zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang / /khyab bdag khyod gcig chags pa med pas dga' ba skyed pa'i bu gtong bas/ /nges par go 'phang bde dang zhi ba dri med dka' ba med

pas 'thob/ /de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di gcig pu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis rgyags sbyin ma bslang ngo snyam nas/ de nas

bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ /yan lag kun bzang khyim thab las/ /'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba/ /rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di/ /bdag la bran mo'i don du

stsol/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas bram ze la smras pa/ ngo tsha med cing brkam pa khyod/ /'di ni bram ze'i tha shal te/ /khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing / /dam chos dga' ba nga 'dod dam/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang

ldan pa'i snying gis rgyags sbyin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang / /de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ /bdag ni bdag la g.yar ngan med/ /de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags/ /gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes/ /de ltar khyod slar

g.yar ngan bgyid/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ go 'phang mi zad mya ngan med pa tshol bdag la/ /sa steng 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dgos/ /khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brongs/ /bdag ni ri dgas 'chi ba bzhin du

bsti gnas then/ /de skad ces smras nas dga' ba dang / /mgu ba dang / yid rab tu dga' bas bsams pa/ /sbyin pa 'di ni nags tshal 'dir/ /bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin/ /rgyags sbyin 'dir yang yongs btang nas/ /yongs su gzung ba med par 'gyur snyam

du rig nas rgyags sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung ste bram ze de la smras pa/ bdag gi mchis brang sdug pa 'di/ /snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan/ /ya rabs tshul can snyan par smra/ /bram ze'i mchog khyod bzhes su gsol/ /de nas mche ba bzang po yi/ /chung ma byang chub

'dod phyir btang / /chu la gru ni ji lta bar/ /sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug g.yos/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te/ khyo dang / bu dang / bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs brdzags pas mgul sgra ngar ngar

por 'gags bzhin 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la/ /ci 'dra ba yi las ngan byas/ /des na ba be'u shi ba bzhin/ /skye bo med pa'i nags na ngu / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas te

rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ skal bzangs bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi/ /bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin lha min 'joms byed de/ /khyod kyi 'dul ba'i mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis/ /

bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis/ /de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba skyes nas brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ spyan stong ldan pa bdag gi bu/ /bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing / /mes po'i drung du phyin par yang / /

sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod/ /de skad ces smras nas yang dbang po chen po bsti gnas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste/ /rgyags sbyin ma lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ /bdag gis khyod

la rgyags sbyin 'di/ /g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas/ /khyod kyis su la ma sbyin cig /bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze khye'u dang bu mo khyer ba de ji ltar grong khyer gzhan yin no snyam nas grong

khyer de nyid du song ste bus pa gzhon nu de dag btsong bar brtsams pa de lta bur rmongs par byas so/ /ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha khyod kyi dbon po mdog nag dang / /dra ba can dang de gnyis ni/ /bram ze shin du ma rungs

pa/ /grong khyer mchog 'dir 'tshong zhing mchis/ /de skad ces thos nas rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa/ /gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig /blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang grong khyer ba rnams myur du rgyal po'i mdun du nye bar lhags

nas/ ji tsam na blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa dang / mi yi dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bo gos med cing / /lus rbeg dri ma can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni/ /mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du ltung gyur te/ /pho brang 'khor mi blon

tshogs bud med dag kyang ngu bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ gang zhig nags na gnas pa yang / /sbyin la mngon par dga' ba'i yid/ /mig bzangs de ni myur du 'dir/ /chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis/ /de nas lha rnams

kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen 'das pa dang / bram ze de dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams lhan cig bsti gnas der song nas byang chub sems

dpa' la gsol ba btab ste/ rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go/ /de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / gnyen bshes

dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ byang chub don du gnyer ba yis/ /rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang / /'jigs pa med par sbyin pa btang / /

gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang / /rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang / /de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin/ /chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bu dang chung ma yongs btang bas/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /

mi yis dag pa thob par 'gyur/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po thams cad gyi bshes gnyen gyis thams cad sgrol gyi ched du bram ze dzu dzu ka la nor mang po sbyin pa de'i tshe de 'byor pa rgya chen por gyur pa dang / de la snying du sdug pa dang / rtsa lag dang / grogs

po dag 'ongs nas smras pa/ khyod kyi 'byor pa dang / /dpal dang skal ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa ci yang rung de dag thams cad ni gzhon nu thams cad sgrol de la brten te yin no/ /des smras pa/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyis kho bo

la ci zhig byas/ rigs mchog gi nang du skyes pas kho bo 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur te/ des na kho bo skal ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gzhon

nu thams cad sgrol gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dzu dzu ka gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/ /da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/ /

de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ cung zad byas pa yang chud mi gsan par bya na mang po la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul tsam pa na khyim bdag gru 'dzin zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang

ldan pa rnam thos gyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par

byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar de'i mngal yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra cung zad kyang mi thos shing grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dang / sman pas

bcas pa'i kha zas ha cang kha ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa ste/ de ltar kha ba dang skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang /

mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba spangs pa'i kha zas kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dang / se mo dos lus brgyan nas lha'i bu mo dga' tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khri'u nas khri'ur dang / khri nas khrir rgyu zhing 'og gis gzhi la mi 'bab bo/ /

de'i tshe khyim bdag gru 'dzin dgos pa 'ga' zhig la rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo / /de yang zla ba dgu 'am/ bcu lon te rgyu skar gro bzhin la bab pa na khye'u gzugs bzang po blta na sdug pa mdzes pa de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra

ba sor bzhi tsam skyes pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas ji tsam na khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyi mi zhig rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab tu song nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin la smras pa/ khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig /khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so/ /de

dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci zhig smra/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so/ /de dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas yang dris pa/ kye nang rje ci zhig smra/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig

btsas so/ /kye nang rje ci zhig smra/ de nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te ci khyim bdag 'di yang nas yang du 'dri ba bdag la kyal ka smra bar mi 'dod grang snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ kye nang

rje khyod kyis nyes te/ gal te khyod kyis lan brgyar smras par gyur na yang / ngas kyang khyod kyi kha gser gyis lan brgya bkang bar 'gyur ba zhig /de nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis mi de'i kha gser lan gsum bkang nas dkor pa la khye'u

dkan dbab pa'i rin gser bye ba nyi shu byin cig ces spring ngo / /khyim bdag gru 'dzin dga' ba dang yid bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha bdag gi khye'u zhig btsas so/ /rgyal pos smras pa legs so/ /ngas de la tsam pa gzhi dang bcas pa

dang / glang po che bdun gyi tshogs sbyin no/ /khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bltas te tsam par 'ongs nas de nas khyim bdag gi gnyen rnams kyis nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas

nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khye'u 'di rgyu skar gro bzhin la btsas la 'di btsas pa na phas kyang dkan dbab pa'i rin du gser bye ba nyi shu byin pas/ de bas na khye'u'i ming gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya

bar gdags so zhes de'i ming gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya bar btags te/ khye'u gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma

'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis skyed par byed/ sring bar byed cing rdzing

na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed de/ de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / lag rtsis dang / dbyung ba dang / gzhug pa dang / gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing / brtag pa brgyad po gzhi brtag

pa dang gos brtag pa dang / rin po che brtag pa dang / shing brtag pa dang / glang po che brtag pa dang / rta brtag pa dang / gzhon nu brtag pa dang / gzhon nu ma brtag pa dang / 'byed pa dang / klog pa la mkhas pa dang / g.yer por gyur to/ /de bsod nams kyi skal ba chen

po dang ldan pa yin no/ /zhes rigs mnyam pa mang pos thos nas bu sring dag byin no/ /de'i phas 'dug pa'i khang pa gsum po dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi rtsig tu bcug ste chung ma gsum po chen ma dang / bar ma dang / chun ma bzhag

nas de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song ste skyes pa med pa na rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshed cing sbyor ro/ /lha sbyin gyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la rbad pa

gzhon nu rgyal po thams cad ni gang gi tshe skra skya bo skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu'i thu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas rab tu 'byung na/ khyod kyi yab ni skra kha dog rnam pa gsum pa'i mthar phyin na 'on kyang 'dod pa rnams la

zhen bzhin te nye bar zhi bar mi 'gro'o/ /ma skyes dgras smras pa/ de nyid kyis shes mod/ de la ci byar yod/ lha sbyin gyis smras pa/ pha rol gnod pa gyis shig /'dod pa don du gnyer ba rnams ni mi byed pa ci yang med pas/ ji tsam na rgyal po

gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das mar gsol nas 'jams gsol bar bzhed pa'i 'jams kyi zhal ta byas te/ 'od ma'i tshal du song ba ma skyes dgras mthong nas des rdo rje rtse gcig pa zhig 'phangs pa dang rgyal po sgra la mkhas pa yin

pas des g.yon phyogs su thug pa'i rdze'u chag par gyur nas de nyid nas slar log go/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta bu mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang

mi mnga' bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lha sbyin gyis zin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms ma rung bar byas kyis tsam

par gru 'dzin gyi bu'i drung du song la bsod snyoms khyer te shog shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar gyur te tsam par

phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa nyi ma la dad pas de nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te nyi ma la phyag byed pa na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brtol nas babs pa/

tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag gis mngon sum kho nar nyi ma nyid kyi gzugs mthong ngo snyam nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ nyi ma brtol nas sa steng mngon

phyogs myur nyid du/ /bdag gi gnas su byon pa 'di ko su zhig lags/ /'di ci nyi ma 'am nor sbyin zla ba 'am brgya byin nam/ /'on te lha yi bdag po mod la gshegs shig gu/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyis kyang de'i bsam

pa shes nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo 'od zer stong gi 'od 'bar nyi ma ma yin rgyu skar bdag po min/ /kho bo rnam thos ma yin mchog ldan ma yin legs pa'i brtul zhugs dbang phyug min/ /kho bo thugs ni gzi brjid kyis 'bar

sangs rgyas sras po yin par shes par byos/ /kho bo thub la bsod snyoms dgongs nas bslang pa'i phyir ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs/ gro bzhin skyes kyis smras pa/ ci shes ldan nyid thub pa yin nam/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/

ji ltar gser gyi ri bo lhun po'i zlar ni yungs kar khyer te 'ong ba dang / /ji ltar nyi ma'i zlar ni sa steng srog chags srin bu me khyer 'jal ba dang / /rin chen gyis phyug rgya mtsho'i zlar ni 'di ni gnag gi rmig rjes sgrun pa ltar/ /de bzhin mi mchog

bla ma sangs rgyas la ltos ston pa'i sras dag rig par gyis gro bzhin skyes kyis smras pa/ rjes su dpag pa 'di yis na/ /bdag gis khyod kyi 'dren pa ni/ /ji ltar dka' thub rab che ba/ /gsal bar rab tu rtogs lags so/ /dgos pa

ci la byon bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyoms phul cig /bcom ldan 'das de su yin/ khyim bdag gi bu dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa

yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod do/ /khyim bdag gi bu de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /des sangs rgyas zhes

bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas ba spu'i khung thams cad g.yos shing mngon par dad pa des snod du btsos pa lnga brgya po de nyid tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la phul lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de las bsod

snyoms blangs nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na tsam pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ des bcom ldan 'das

la bsod snyoms phul te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol bar brtsams pa na/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos snod nas btsos pa phyi ma shos khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / ji tsam na 'od ma'i tshal

thams cad kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par mthong nas des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/ lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te/ 'di ltar 'od ma'i tshal

'di kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur to snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/ lha gzhan dag gis bsod

snyoms phul ba 'am ci lags na/ 'di ltar 'od ma'i tshal 'di zhal zas kyi dri gda' ba sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang ma yin

la/ lha gzhan rnams kyis kyang ma phul te/ de lta mod kyi khyod nyid kyi yul tsam pa na gru 'dzin gyi bu nyi ma re re lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshed cing sbyor ba yod de/ /de las dge slong maud gal gyi bus blangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i

bsngags pa gsung bar brtsams pa thos nas de yang mthong bar 'dod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can de ni bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang

ldan pa yin pas khyod bsod nams yongs su zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis de la bka' ma stsol cig /de lta mod kyi rgyal po chen po lhung bzed kyi lhag ma la longs spyod cig /des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi

bo nas dbang bskur ba lags te/ sngon ni su'i lhung bzed kyi lhag ma yang ma 'tshal lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos nyid kyis bdag gi yab lags pas/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na longs spyod par bgyi'o zhes

des longs spyod par brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' yang bza' ba dang btung ba 'di 'dra ba longs spyad pa yod dam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag kyang rgyal po'i

rgyud du btsas/ rgyal po'i rgyud las chen por gyur cing rgyal por gyur kyang g.yar zas dang btung ba 'di 'dra ba ni sngon lan 'ga' yang myong bar ma 'tshal lags so/ /rgyal po chen po sems can skal ba chen po de ni 'di ltar 'di 'dra ba'i bza' ba

dang btung ba la longs spyod/ de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas/ des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan

dag yul tsam par 'dong gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig /ci'i slad du lags/ gru 'dzin gyi bu blta'o/ /lha'i yul na de mchis pas de nyid dgug tu gsol/ de ni sems can bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa yin pas

de bka' mi stsol to/ /lha ji ltar bka' ma stsal kyang bdag cag gis mchi bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi 'o/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de rnams kyis tsam par yi ge spring ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur gyis grong khyer byi dor gyis shig /

rtswa dang chas dag sta gon gyis shig ces spring ba de rnams kyis thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur pa dang yang yi ge spring ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po ni mi gshegs mod kyi gzhon nu gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes spring ba dang / de rnams skrag ste gzhon nu

gtum po lan 'ga' zhig 'ongs na yang gnod par 'gyur ro snyam nas yang spring ba/ rgyal po yang mi gshegs gzhon nu yang mi gshegs te/ de lta mod kyi khyed kyis gang 'ga' ji ltar rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'bab pa de ltar gags rtsigs shig

ces spring ba thos nas tsam pa na gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi mi rnams 'dus nas shes ldan dag gdon mi za bar rgyal po ni bdag cag la chad pa gcad par bzhed pas des na yi ge 'di skad spring mod ces de rnams kyis blon po rnams la don de spring ba

dang / de rnams kyis blags te yang drang por spring ba/ shes ldan dag 'di ni bden pa yin te/ rgyal po dang gzhon nu yang mi gshegs la/ gang gA bgags pa yang dgos pa cung zad kyang med do/ /de lta mod kyi lha ni gru 'dzin gyi bu blta bar bzhed

do zhes spring ba dang / de rnams kyis nyan rna ba'i mi zhig mngags so/ /des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do/ /de nas de rnams 'dus nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyi drung du song nas khyim bdag lha gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa blta bar bzhed

nas blon po rnams kyis bdag la drang por spring ste/ nyan rna ba'i mis kyang don de nyid smras na/ 'di thong shig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i gags kyi skal pa gang yin pa gser gyi gong bus rtsig kyang bla'i mi btang ngo / /

de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te de lta yin du zin kyang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse bar gyis shig des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te khyed cag gi bu rnams kyang

gro bzhin skyes dang lhan cig gtong ba lta na btang ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /'o na shes ldan dag deng shig /khyim bdag gru 'dzin gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu grong mi 'di dag 'di skad ces zer ro/ /des smras pa/ yab gal te de lta na mchi'o/ /bu gdon mi za bar rgyal po de khyod kyi rkang mthil gyi spu gser gyi kha dog can blta bar 'dod kyis/ rgyal po de dag ni gnas ma yin par khro

bas khyod la gnod par 'gyur du 'ong gis khyod kyis rkang pa bteg ste de la bstan par mi bya'o/ /'di re mu tig phreng ba 'di rgyal po de'i zhabs kyi drung du zhog la phyag byas nas de'i spyan sngar skyil mo dkrung chos te 'dug shig dang / des na spu rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /

khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis bsams pa/ gro bzhin skyes bzhon pa gang gis gtang / ci glang po che'i bzhon pas sam/ rta'i bzhon pas sam/ shing rta'i bzhon pas sam/ 'on te gru'i bzhon pas snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag gi nang na gru'i

bzhon pa mchog yin pas gru'i bzhon pas gtad do snyam du bsams nas des chu bo gang gA la gru sbrengs nas der skyed mos tshal rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug ste/ me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang /

ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug la sogs pa bya rnams skad 'byin cing rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs dang / bud med rgyan sna tshogs kyis klubs pa dag 'dug tu bcug ste/ 'byor pa des chu'i nang nas btang ngo / /de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu nye bar phyin pa/

rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gru 'dzin gyi bu 'ong ngo zhes thos nas des rgyal po'i khab nas gang gA'i 'bab chu'i bar der 'obs brkos nas chus bkang ste de'i nang nas gru drangs so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer yang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal cing tsan

dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim po'i pog phor bzhag /dar gyi chun phyang mang po btags/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan btsugs me tog sna tshogs kyis lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas te/ de 'byor pa des rgyal

po'i khab kyi grong khyer du khrid do/ /de nas rgyal po seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i rkang pa'i drung du mu tig gi phreng ba bzhag nas mgo bos phyag byas te mdun du skyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spu yod pa

mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kye ma gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa ni bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /mthong nas smras pa gro bzhin skyes khyod kyi bcom ldan 'das mthong ngam/ lha ma mthong lags so/ /

tshur shog 'dong ngo / /des dris pa lha ci bcom ldan 'das bzhon pas gshegs sam/ 'on te zhabs kyis lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de rab tu byung ba yin na de la bzhon pas ci bya/ des smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag kyang sug pa kho nas 'chi'o zhes

de rkang pa kho nas chas pa na/ de'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis sa la gos dag bting ba dang / des smras pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das gding ba las bzhud dam/ 'on te gding ba med par bzhud/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gding ba med par bzhud do/ /des smras

pa/ gding ba sdus shig /bdag kyang gding ba med par 'gro'o/ /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis gos rnams bsdus pa dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bting nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag la ma bzlog gam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/

lha bzlog lags so/ /'o na yang su zhig gis bting / lha khyod bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po mnga' bas mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bting lags grang / des snying nas tshig tu smras pa/ mi ma yin pa dag gos rnams sdus shig /de rnams kyis

bsdus nas rkang pa sa la bzhag pa na sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs

mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du gru 'dzin gyi bus lan 'ga' yang gding ba med par rkang pa sa la ma bor te/ da ltar bor ba yang chos la gus pas yin gyi bsod nams yongs su zad pas

ni ma yin te/ des na sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug

go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad pas gro bzhin skyes

bye ba nyi shu pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong ba dang / de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang

na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi

spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pha mas ma gnang ba'i rigs kyi bu rab tu 'byin pa

dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed kyis song la pha dang / ma la rtogs shig /rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni rten pa thams cad kyi dpon po lags te don du 'di ni chos nyid kyis bdag gi bu lags pas 'di bdag gis gnang lags kyis

bcom ldan 'das ci legs su rab tu dbyung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag kho nar

skra byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog

bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /drug sde rnams kyis de la co dri bar brtsams pa/ re shig bstan pa la ni gcig tu

brtson par bya dgos pa yin na/ mar sar gyi gong bu 'dis khyad par ci zhig rtogs par 'gyur zhes de rnams kyis de co dris pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gcig tu brtson pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsungs pa gang lags/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes 'chag pas thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur

ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /des bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ste/ 'chag sa byas nas de na tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rgyal po'i khab kyi bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gnas nas rtag tu 'grus

pa dang ldan par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pa'i sgom pas gnas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag bzhag pa na sems la sems

kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di snyam du skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji snyed cig yod pa de rnams kyi nang na bdag mchog yin na/ 'on kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam

par grol bar ma gyur gyis/ bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po yod pas/ ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cing sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe

dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas dge slong zhig la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog /khyod gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song la phyin nas gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces gro bzhin skyes bye

ba nyi shu pa khyod la ston pa gsung ngo zhes sgo shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong des bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye

ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes khyod la ston pa gsung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas dge slong de las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba

der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

gro bzhin skyes khyod gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag bzhag pa na sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na bdag mchog yin na/

'on kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur gyis/ bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po yod pas ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cing sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod

nams dag bya'o snyam pa skyes par ma gyur tam/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du bsams nas 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang skyo bas ba spu zing zhes

byed nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa de lta lags so/ /de'i phyir gro bzhin skyes khyod la dri yis khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin de'i lan thob shig /gro bzhin skyes ji snyam du sems khyod sngon khyim par gyur pa na

pi bang gi rgyud kyi sgra la mkhas pa yin nam/ btsun pa bdag sngon khyim par gyur pa na pi bang gi rgyud kyi sgra la mkhas pa mad lags so/ /gro bzhin skyes ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe pi bang gi rgyud shin du bsdams par gyur pa de'i tshe ji ga pi bang gi sgra snyan par

'gyur ba 'am/ sgra yid du 'ong ba 'am/ sgra dang ldan pa 'am/ las su rung bar 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /'o na gang gi tshe pi bang gi rgyud lhag par lhod par gyur pa de'i tshe ji ga pi bang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba 'am/ sgra yid du 'ong ba 'am/ sgra dang ldan pa 'am/ las su

rung bar 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /gang gi tshe pi bang gi rgyud shin du bsdams pa ma yin zhing lhag par lhod pa ma yin par gyur te rgyud ran par 'dug pa de'i tshe pi bang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba 'am/ sgra yid du 'ong ba 'am/ sgra dang ldan pa 'am/ las su rung

bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam/ btsun pa de lta lags so/ /gro bzhin skyes de bzhin du ha cang brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni rgod par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang zhan na ni zhum par 'gyur ro/ /gro bzhin skyes de lta bas na khyod kyis ran pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/ des kyang

nga rgyal du mi bya zhing de la yang bag yod par bya/ de'i tshe mtshan ma yang gzung bar bya/ gro bzhin skyes khyod gnas pa 'dis gnas na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa rnam par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol

ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te/ bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes sgrogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas

tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis pi bang gi dpe 'dis tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes la gdams ngag phog nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar

gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid

la rang gi mngon sum du byas te/ bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de kun shes par gyur te/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom

par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa dgra bcom pa thob ste/ rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ni 'di yin

no snyam nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /

phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa dge slong dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/

srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de de'i tshe gnas drug la mos par 'gyur te nges par 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur ba lags/ 'tshe ba ma mchis pa la mos

par 'gyur ba lags/ rab tu dben pa la mos par 'gyur ba lags/ sred pa zad pa dang / len pa zad pa dang / mi brjed pa'i sems la mos par 'gyur ba lags so/ /btsun pa 'di na kha cig 'di snyam du kye ma tshe dang ldan pa 'di dad pa tsam kho na la gnas

pas nges par 'byung ba la mos so snyam du sems na/ btsun pa de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pas nges par 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa 'di na kha cig 'di snyam du

kye ma tshe dang ldan pa 'di tshul khrims tsam kho na la brten nas mi 'tshe ba la mos so snyam du sems na/ btsun pa de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pas mi 'tshe ba la mos par 'gyur lags

so/ /btsun pa 'di na kha cig 'di snyam du kye ma tshe dang ldan pa 'di rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa tsam kho na tshol ba'i slad du rab tu dben pa la mos so snyam du sems na/ btsun pa de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang /

zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / len pa zad pa las mi brjed pa'i sems la yang mos par 'gyur lags te/ /btsun pa dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/

srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de de'i tshe de gnas drug po 'di dag la mos par 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa dge slong slob pa gang yin pa ma thob pa gang lags

pa de gong ma'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba'i tshul la lan mang du gnas te/ de de'i tshe slob pa'i tshul khrims dang / slob pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa lags so/ /de dus gzhan na zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa'i rnam par grol

ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes sgrogs pa de'i tshe ni de mi

slob pa'i tshul khrims dang / mi slob pa'i dbang po rnams dang ldan lags so// //'dul ba gzhi/ / bam po brgya rtsa gcig pa/ btsun pa dper na bus pa gzhon nu chung ngu zhan pa gan rkyal du nyal ba de ni de'i tshe byis pa'i ngang tshul dang / byis pa'i

dbang po rnams dang ldan lags la/ de dus gzhan na chen por gyur pa'i rgyus dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa de'i tshe ni chen po'i ngang tshul dang / chen po'i dbang po dang ldan lags so/ /btsun pa de bzhin du dge slong slob pa yid ma thob pa gang lags

pa de gong ma'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la don du gnyer ba'i tshul la lan mang du gnas te/ de de'i tshe slob pa'i tshul khrims dang slob pa'i dbang po dang ldan lags so/ /de dus gzhan na zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa'i

rnam par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan

mi shes so zhes sgrogs pa de'i tshe ni mi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang / mi slob pa'i dbang po dang ldan lags so/ /gal te de'i mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams mig la shin du snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems

dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa shin du rnam par grol ba/ shin du bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su blta'o/ /gal te de'i rna bas rnam par shes par

bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / /lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams yid la shin du snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam

par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur te de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa/ shin du rnam par grol ba/ shin du bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su blta'o/ /btsun pa dper na grong

khyer ram/ grong rdal dang ha cang yang thag mi ring ba zhig na ri brag chen po ser ga ma mchis pa/ shin du mkhregs pa gcig tu 'thas pa zhig mchis na/ de la gal te shar phyogs nas rlung gi shugs drag po langs kyang de g.yos par mi 'gyur/ de 'gul bar

mi 'gyur zhing / de nub phyogs su bkur bar mi nus lags so/ /gal te lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas rlung gi shugs drag po langs kyang de g.yos par mi 'gyur/ de 'gul bar mi 'gyur zhing de lho phyogs su bkur bar mi nus lags

te/ gang nas rlung gi shugs drag po langs kyang des de g.yos par mi 'gyur/ de 'gul bar mi 'gyur zhing de gang du yang bkur bar mi nus lags so/ /de bzhin du gal te de'i mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams mig la shin du snang

bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur te de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa/ shin du rnam par grol ba/ shin du bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su lta'o/ /

gal te de'i rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes

par bya ba'i chos rnams yid la shin du snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang / rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa/ shin du rnam par grol ba/ shin du bsgoms pa de

nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su lta'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas/ de skad ces gsol nas gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nges par 'byung la mos pa dang / /

sems ni 'tshe ba med pa dang / /rab tu dben la mos pa dang / /sred pa zad la dga' ba dang / /len pa zad la mos pa dang / /sems ni brjed pa med gyur pa/ /skye mched skye ba shes nas su/ /sems ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas sems

ni rnam grol zhing / /sems zhi ba yi skyob pa yis/ /bya ba dag ni byas zin pas/ /bya ba yod pa ma yin no/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo la/ /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos pa/ /de bzhin sdug dang mi sdug pa'i/ /gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang / /

dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / /chos kyis skyob pa mi g.yo ste/ /bkrir mi btub pa'i sems gnas shing / /de la 'ang zad par rjes su lta/ /dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus

pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shing rkang pa'i mthil gnyis su spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba skyes pa dang /

gdugs re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas sgrol zhing sbyor ba dang / 'di nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lan 'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa ma bzhag pa dang / btsas ma thag tu dkan dbab pa'i rin

gser bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gro bzhin skyes

bye ba nyi shu pa 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas gro bzhin skyes 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag

gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ /dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las

dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams

la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha

lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba byung ste/ de dge slong drug khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan

zhes bya bar gshegs so/ /rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan na dga' sde rab tu mang po gnas te/ de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dge slong drug khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor te ljongs rgyu zhing

gshegs pa na 'dir byon to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang thams cad 'dus te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs

gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis dga' sde rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/

yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzeng bstod/

yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas dga' sde rab tu mang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud

de/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag cag dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims

cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dga' sde rab tu mang po rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / de nas dga'

sde rab tu mang pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la

mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo / /de rnams 'dun khang du 'dus te gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bya/ ci 'dus te bya 'am/ 'on te re res bya/ de na

kha cig gis smras pa/ nyi ma re re zhing 'dus te gdugs tshod gsol na bdag cag gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams bar chad du 'gyur bas shes ldan dag gal te 'dod na re mos re mos gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis re mos re mos spyi

bungs las ston mo bya bar brtsams te/ 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin bdag nyid kyi yang snon par byed do/ /de nas dga' sde rnams kyi nang na bram ze'i khye'u bkren pa zhig yod pa de ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/ yul dga' sde rnams kyis khrims

su bcas pa re mos re mos bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o zhes bcas na/ de la bdag gi 'byor pa ni nyung na bdag gis ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bgyi/ des smras pa/ bu gal te de lta na khyod kyis nyi ma tha ma zung la

dus de'i bar du cung zad sgrubs shig /tshogs kyi rgyu lhag kyang cung zad rnyed grang / des nyi ma tha ma bzung nas de na tshogs kyi rgyu lhag pa rab tu mang po yod pa dang / des kyang cung zad bsgrubs nas de nas des gnas khang rtsig tu bcug ste/ der gos rnams

bting nas grwa rnams su kar sha pa Na lnga lnga bzhag /de la dom lpags shig bdog pa de yang gnas khang gi sgor bting ngo / /de nas lnga brgya'i ston mo snod du btsos shing sbyar nas bskur sti chen pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam

par gzigs la gdugs tshod gsol te zhabs la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing lan 'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa mi

'jog pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam 'khrungs pa ji 'dra ba de lta bur bdag gi yang de dang 'dra ba dang yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang

thob cing / ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur gyis mi mnyes par bgyid par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dga' sde'i bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni gro bzhin skyes bye ba

nyi shu pa 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes pa

dang / rkang pa gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam skyes pa dang / 'di nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lan 'ga' yang gding ba med pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa ma bor ba dang / btsas pa na yang dkan dbab

pa'i rin du gser bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing / nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin

pa ni gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu

dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lha sbyin gyis zin pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i

khab na gnas pa'i grong mi rnams kyis 'phya bar brtsams te/ de na kha cig ni rgyal po la mi snyan pa sgrogs par byed de/ /'di ma btsas pa nyid nas yab la dgrar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ ci'i phyir ma btsas pa nyid du ma bsad/ gzhan

dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal pos ma nyes te ci thams cad kyi lung bstan pa bden par 'gyur ram/ gzhon nu nyid dul ba yin mod kyi 'on kyang lha sbyin mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bslus nas des na bya ba ngan pa la shin du

zhugs par gyur to/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po dang lha sbyin gyis kyang ma nyes te/ 'on kyang lha sbyin khrid de 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du mi bzhag par 'di ltar rab tu 'byin par mdzad pas na bcom ldan

'das kho nas nongs so/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma nongs te/ de gang gi phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las ma byas pas dge 'dun gyis nyes so/ /de nas gang dag rgyal po la mi snyan par sgrogs pa des rgyal po ngo tsha bar

mi byed kyi/ sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams su bdag gis las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa yin no snyam mo/ /gang dag bcom ldan 'das dang dge 'dun la mi snyan pa sgrogs pa des ni rgyal po shin du ngo tsha bar byed de/ bdag gi lus ngan pa gang

yin pa des 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das dang dge 'dun gyi mi snyan pa brjod do snyam mo/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nongs pa gzhan gyis bgyis la skyon gzhan la

sgo ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nyes pa gzhan gyis byas la skyon gzhan la bsgos pa nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer

bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo'i tshogs mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de la khyi gnyis zhig yod pa 'gram dang nye 'gram zhes bya ste/ de gnyis

kyis rgyal po'i rta khrab kyi cha spyad 'chos so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin dra ma la cha ba na des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rta khrab kyi yo byad ltos shig /de rnams kyis blta bar brtsams pa na thams cad bcad cing rab

tu gtubs par mthong nas de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha rta khrab kyi cha spyad khyi rnams kyis 'tshal to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas khyi rnams yongs su spangs so/ /de na kha cig ni bsad do/ /kha cig ni bros so/ /

ji tsam na yul gzhan gyi khyi zhig yul nas bA rA Na sIr 'ong ba na des de rnams 'bros pa mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed 'di ltar skrag /de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang des smras pa/ khyed ci'i phyir rgyal po la

gsol bar ma byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhan dag ni kha btag /kho bo cag ni bros na rgyal po la gsol bar bya ba'i gtol ga la yod/ /des smras pa/ 'dug shig dang khyed kyi don du kho bos rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o/ /des de rnams dbugs phyung

nas slar log pa dang / de nas des rgyun lugs chad tsam na thos pa'i nyen kor du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ rgyal po'i khab na khyi gnyis mchis pa 'gram dang ni/ /nye 'gram stobs dang kha dog ldan pa gang lags pa/ /de 'dir dgum

rgyu bdag cag dgum pa'i rgyu ma lags/ /lha cig dgum rgyu ma lags bkum pa rigs pa min/ /rgyal pos thos nas des nam langs pa dang blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag mdang sum nga la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba byed pa gang

yin pa de tshol cig /de rnams kyis sku srungs rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag mdang sum lha la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba byed pa de tshol cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ yul gyi khyi lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci 'gram dang nye

'gram gyis zos sam 'on te/ khyi gzhan rnams kyis yin rtogs shig /blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag lhas 'di skad ces khyi rnams rtogs shig ces bka' stsal na/ de rnams la ji ltar brtag par bya/ gzhan dag

gis smras pa/ de la gzhan brtag tu ci yod/ skra'i thum po byin te skyug tu gzhug mod/ de rnams kyis skra'i thum po byin te skyug tu bcug pa las/ ji tsam na 'gram dang nye 'gram gnyis ko ba'i dum bur skyugs nas rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang /

rgyal pos de gnyis spangs te/ lhag ma rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin no/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'gram dang nye 'gram gang yin pa de gnyis ni lha sbyin dang / ma skyes dgra 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang 'di gnyis kyis

nyes pa byas la skyon gzhan la bsgo'o/ /da ltar yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa byas la skyon gzhan la bsgo'o/ /gzhan yang ji ltar lha sbyin byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na

rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ ji tsam na mi zhig sta re dang khur shing thogs te shing gi phyir nags khrod du song nas/ de de na shing tshol bar byed pa na seng ges skrag nas bros pa las sur khung zhig tu lhung ngo / /seng ges

kyang de bza' ba'i bsam pas de nyid du lhung ngo / /sbrul zhig gis byi ba zhig skrag nas bros pa dang / khras byi ba bza' ba'i phyir bsnyags pa las/ ci tsam na thams cad sur khung du lhung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig la gcig bsad par 'dod

pa'i gnod sems dang ldan par gyur pa dang seng ges smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed thams cad kho bo'i bgrod pa yin te/ de lta mod kyi bdag cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob pas 'di ni gnod par bya ba'i dus ma yin gyis ma 'gul

bar 'khod cig /stes dbang gis rngon pa zhig ri dgas rnams tshol zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang / des sur khung der blta bar brtsams pa las/ de rnams kyis brtabs pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ kye nang rje skyabs gyis shig /de nas rngon pa des

shes nas thog mar seng ge phyung ba dang / des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ khyod kyi drin gzo bar bya ste/ 'on kyang 'di na mgo nag po gnas pa de ni byas pa chud gson pa yin gyis khyod kyis ma dbyung shig ces smras nas song ngo / /

ji tsam na rngon pa des thams cad mthar gyis phyung ngo / /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na seng ges ri dgas shig bsad pa dang rngon pa de yang phyogs der phyin pa seng ges de ngo shes nas rngon pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te ri dgas de byin no/ /dus gzhan

zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin btsun mo dang lhan cig bskyed mos tshal gyi sar song nas des bskyed mos tshal der bde ba nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid kyis log go/ /btsun mo bud med rnams kyang bag yangs su gnas pas gos dag phud

de skems/ rgyan dag bkrol nas phyogs dag tu bzhag te bskyed mos tshal na 'chag par byed/ 'dug par byed/ nyal bar byed/ gnyid log par byed do/ /ji tsam na btsun mo zhig rgyan rnams bkrol te phyogs zhig tu bzhag nas gnyid

log pa dang khras de blangs nas rngon pa de la byas pa gzo bar bya ba'i phyir byin no/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gnyid kyis snyom pa bsal nas myur ba myur bar bA rA Na sIr zhugs so/ /btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang /

yul mi rnams kyang rings par dong ngo / /ji tsam na btsun mo des rgyan btsal ba las ma rnyed nas des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bskyed mos tshal du bdag gi rgyan stor lags so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan

dag rgyan stor gyis su yis khyer tshol cig /de rnams kyis btsal bar brtsams pa na mgo nag po de rngon pa'i drung du dus dus su 'gro bas de de'i khyim du song ba na mtshan ma las de la rgyan yod par shes nas/ byas pa chud gzon pa des

rgyal po'i drung du song nas gsol pa dang / de nas rgyal po mchog tu khros te rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rngon pa bkug nas smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis bskyed mos tshal nas rgyan brkus so/ /de nas de skrag nas ji ltar gyur pa smras te

rgyan de rgyal po la phul na/ 'on kyang mi de bcings nas btson rar bzhag go/ /byi bas song nas sbrul la smras pa/ mgo nag po sdig pa byed pa des bya ba byas nas bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgyal pos bcings nas btson rar bzhag go/ /

sbrul gyis smras pa/ kye rngon pa de ring bdag gis rgyal po la zin par byas khyod kyis sngags kyi tshig 'di dang sman 'di dag gis gsos shig dang / de ltar na rgyal po de dga' nas khyod gdon mi za bar btang nas longs spyod kyang bgo

bsha' byed par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig /sbrul gyis rgyal po zin pa dang rngon pas song ste sngags dang sman de dag gis gsos so/ /de nas rgyal po mgu nas btson las btang ste longs spyod dag gis

bgo bsha' yang byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byas pa chud gson pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di

nyid yin te/ /de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/ /da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/ /gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon

byung ba dus ma yin par zhag bdun du sprin chags te lhas char phab nas ne'u le zhig byi ba'i tshang du zhugs so/ /sbrul zhig kyang char pas skrag nas phan tshun rgyu ba na de nyid du zhugs so/ /ji tsam na ne'u le des byi ba de gsad par brtsams

pa na sbrul gyi smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob kyis gcig la gcig gnod pa ma byed par ma 'gul bar 'khod cig /de na sbrul gyi ming ni dga' sde zhes bya'o/ /ne'u le'i ming ni dga' bo

zhes bya'o/ /byi ba'i ming ni gang gas byin zhes bya'o/ /dga' sde dang / dga' bos gang gas byin la smras pa/ khyod 'jab cing song la bdag cag gi kha zas tshol cig /de drang zhing bsam pa bzang ba yin pas de gnyis kyi ched du snying

nas kha zas btsal bar brtsams pa na ma rnyed do/ /dga' bos dga' sde la smras pa/ gal te gang gas byin kha zas med par 'ongs na de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o/ /dga' sdes bsams pa/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa

dog pa thob na yang 'di de la gsod par rtsom na/ gal te de kha zas med par 'ongs na lta smos kyang ci dgos pas ye de la spring bar bya'o snyam nas des de la spring ba/ dga' bo na re 'di skad ces gal te gang gas byin kha zas med par

'ongs na de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o zhes zer ro/ /gang gas byin gyis kha zas btsal ba las cung zad kyang ma rnyed nas des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar des bdag zos par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des dga' sde la spring ba/ mi bkren ltogs

pa'i shugs kyis yongs dub nas/ /nyam thag snying rje med par 'gyur bas khyod/ /byas pa chud gson sems can de la ni/ /gang gas byin pa phyir mi 'ong zhes gsungs/ /zhes spring ngo / /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gang gas
